review: Great setting with good food, service and atmosphere. Was able to get a walk in table in October, but will be much busier in summer. Good location with great views.
We enjoyed the food and service. It is a great place for dining out with friends and families. Excellent food and good pairings to enrich our Dubrovnik story.

Truly an exceptional experience! It was my husband’s birthday, our reservation was mixed up by our travel agent but they worked with us to make a most memorable experience. Our waiter Antonio was fantastic, engaging, and very knowledgeable with terrific recommendations. The view, the wine, the food, the service - we will never forget this night!

Everything from the beautiful venue on the water overlooking the Old Town to the delicious food and superb wines and cocktails to the outstanding staff was exceptional! The food presentation was amazing and the staff was not only helpful with their suggestions but made our dining experience so much fun! It was our last night visiting Croatia and the best dinner to end our trip!

On Nautika's website the restaurant calls itself "the best in Dubrovnik" and "the sixth most romantic restaurant in the world" according to Condé Nast Traveller magazine. Also on June 6, 2003, Nautika had the honor of hosting Pope John Paul II. For our special dinner in Dubrovnik we booked several days in advance specifically to have a table in the front row on the terrace with panoramic views of the sea and the fortresses of Lovrijenac and Bokar. Unfortunately they were unlucky: that evening a strong and cold wind blew, so we were placed in an interior room, however ancient and elegant, although without any panoramic view. Patience, we hope that next time we will be luckier with the reservation of the "front row table". 
We both tried the Bokar" 5-course tasting menu, at €155 per person: although some courses were truly exceptional, I would say without a doubt that at Nautika you pay mainly for the location and the high-class Service they offer, rather than for the food itself. 
Finally, a strange thing: the waiter in white gloves was quick to pour us more wine as soon as he realized that our glasses were empty. On the contrary, it did not do the same with mineral water: that we had to serve it alone throughout the evening. Really a strange thing for such a listed location, but perhaps at the Nautika restaurant -"the best in Dubrovnik" - it is used this way.

To sit on the wonderful terrace and enjoy the historic theatre of Dubrovnik's old town was one thing. To enjoy the exquisite food was another. To witness the enthralling evening display of a flock of Alpine swifts (birds we had never seen before) was utterly enchanting. Everything was first class. The cuisine, the service and the sense of humour. Can not be faulted. You will pay a pretty penny in silver but it is worth it because you will never forget it. Why? Because it will make you smile. Thank you Mario and all the staff, Steve Walsh. (We will return).

My meal at Nautika was a very memorable experience. It started with our table - overlooking the fortress and the sea. Everyone in our party ordered the Bokar tasting menu and we were not disappointed. The fish soup and the shrimp were standouts for me - so delicious. I really liked the unique olive oil pairings with each course. The service was impeccable and our waiter was knowledgeable and good natured. There is an extensive wine menu catering to all tastes and price points. Dinner at Nautika was a highlight of my trip to Croatia and I would recommend it without hesitation.

What a truly fantastic evening celebrating our wedding anniversary in such a stunning setting! The food was absolutely delicious, the wine service exceptional, the cocktail to die for, and every member of staff was wonderfully attentive. A special thank you to our waiter, Henry – your service was outstanding. We dined outside, and although it was a little chilly, the team thoughtfully provided a heater and cosy blankets, which made it perfect. Thank you, Nautika, for an unforgettable evening and a perfect way to end our stay in Croatia! :)

We went without reservation and at the recommendation of the guide of a free tour and we really liked the place, with fantastic views of the fortress, as well as the prawn risotto and the exquisite treatment received. The price, if you order with a head, is very reasonable in a very expensive city.
Excellent service and foods. I will definitely come back again. The steak is so good and it’s one of the best steak I have ever had

I recently celebrated my 60th birthday in Dubrovnik Croatia with my closest friends and had a very special dinner at Restaurant Nautika. The atmosphere is elegant and the dining experience and the view is not to be missed. The food is masterfully created and plated, delicious and well worth the visit. Our waiter "Henry" was delightful and very professional with his white glove service. The entire restaurant staff made my birthday celebration very memorable.
Antoni was great. Made us feel comfortable and we had a laugh while providing immaculate service at the same time. Very knowledgeable
Beautiful venue with top quality menu & service. Absolutely worth the price for the food and the experience. Our waiter (Antonio) was genuinely friendly and all staff were exceptionally attentive.

The food was delicious and the setting was very romantic, Ante our waiter was so helpful explaining the menu and the different dishes as they came out. All in all a great experience and definitely worth getting a seat with a good view!
What an incredible restaurant. The view stunning, the wait staff beyond attentive, excellent and fun. The drink presentation over the top and the dinner incredible!
Excellent grilled fish and veggies cooked just right - nice amount of herbs and salt and fresh lemon was all it needed. Nice atmosphere and bottle of rose finished it off!

Usually we have unforgettable dinners st Michelin restaurants But not this time.
Only a few items were memorable the rest were not worth half the price.
Yes the view is amazing but not worth those prices.
Suggest you book Gradska Arsenal instead for better service, food and cocktails.

beautiful experience! this was a real treat, the service is second to none. the staff is impressively professional, friendly and funny which was nice to see in such a high-end
environment. the sommelier even took us in to view a few of the fine wines that they have in house as my son in law is a bit of a connoisseur! the food of course was nothing less than a Michelin. Thanks!

Food service ambiance all 10/10 

Very unique and just about the best way we could have ended our honeymoon 

Our server was cordial friendly and great

Absolutely beautiful. Absolutely delicious. Absolutely great service (thank you Antonio).
Pricey but worth it. Splurge - you’re worth it!
A wonderful experience. The staff were lovely, incredibly knowledgeable about the food and drink, and very welcoming. Yes it’s expensive, but the food is exquisite and worth every penny.

We booked Nautica as a treat towards the end of the holiday. I had read the reviews and knew it was not going to be a cheap evening out but all I can say is wow. It was a perfect evening, overlooking the sea and the walls of the City in a great atmosphere and with just the best food.
From the moment you arrive they make you feel welcome and special, you walk in through the entrance and they had a piano player and you are taken to your seat and the service is exceptional. The waiters have white gloves and they really look after you.
I can’t fault anything, the food and the flavours were unbelievable and the cocktails were some of the best we’ve had anywhere. I had scallops for starter and lamb for main and everything was perfect, my wife had the fish and it was cooked to perfection.
A great selection of wines and drinks and the deserts were also amazing.
If you are looking for a restaurant for a special treat then give this place a try, be prepared it’s not cheap but you are paying for an amazing experience and you get it and as a treat to end our week in Dubrovnik it was worth it.

Service was exceptional and presentation of every course was artistically choreographed. Everything was cooked perfectly and almost too pretty to eat. Nothing wowed my pallet, maybe I was distracted by the presentation. One of the priciest dinners we had in this trip, but overall very good. Service was exceptional. Very impressive establishment. Reserve in advance.

Just wow….
You would come here for the views alone. Set amongst the most enviable position with views of the fort and walls, and the sea beyond, just sitting here watching the sun set would be a memory in itself.
Then you add in amazing food, sumptuous wines, excellent service and an ambience that truly makes you feel that you have experienced a little taste and gem of Croatia.
Mario needs a special mention as his personality and attention to detail made this one absolutely magical night. Thank you once again.

Wonderful dinner! Even had a special tasting menu for me as a vegetarian. Antonio provided exceptional service with suggestions and we never had to wait for anything. Courses and drinks timed perfectly. Very highly recommend.

While perfectly located at a very beautiful and breathtaking spot overlooking the Adriatic ocean, the staff managed to enhance that beauty by providing the best service, the most delicious meal and creative meal and the best gestures to enhance the celebration of my birthday! Not only did they go out of their way to ensure I had a the most wonderful time with their courteousness and amazing white glove service, but the also went the extra mile by moving closer over looking the water and the most beautiful view of the Adriatic. All of these gestures made my celebration al the more special while supported by the deliciously tasting and creative food, paired perfectly by the most poignant wine suggestion of a local variety, previously unknown to me, trusting their expert suggestion which complimented my meal very specially. They also took extra steps and had extra gesture to provide a portable phone charger to my table as my phones battery was exhausted from taking so many pictures of my beautifully presented food and beautiful settings. 
A very special thanks to Antonio, my server, who was extremely attentive and guided me perfectly to the best and most delicious meal option, also a very special thanks to the sommelier Darko , who suggested the most delicious local wine which was previously unknown to me enhancing the meal just perfectly. 
Everyone at Nautika deserves the collective praise of making this, not only one of the best culinary experiences I have ever had, but the warmth and attentiveness of its staff makes it a most for your visit to Dubrovnik.
We met a very helpful and passionate staff which makes our dinner even enjoyable! The name is this staff if Antonio! Besides, food is good and view is amazing though

The food is delicious with amazing views.
Staff Antonio is nice and professional.
We have a wonderful moment and enjoy very much☺️

We were celebrating a friend birthday, Antonio elevated our experience to another level. His knowledge of food and drinks selection brought us to another level we ever experience in USA. 
We loved the European hospitality very very much appreciate it.

Great birthday dinner for my group of six guests. The food was decadent. Antonio met all of our needs and was attentive and knowledgeable and everything. Would come back again went back into Dubrovnik.

Dining at Nautika was an unforgettable experience, and Antonio made it truly exceptional. From the moment we arrived, his warm welcome and genuine attentiveness set the tone for the evening. He guided us through the menu with such knowledge and passion, making excellent recommendations that perfectly matched our tastes. Every detail of the service was flawless — professional yet personal — and he made us feel like honored guests rather than just diners. With breathtaking views and outstanding cuisine, Nautika is already special, but Antonio’s care and hospitality elevated it to a whole new level. Highly recommend!
The most amazing food, the most amazing service by Antonio, the most amazing ambience. Wow!!!! Highly highly recommend!

An unforgettable experience at Nautika restaurant last night. Ivan is an incredible asset to the restaurant, his knowledge on the menu and his personable approach to welcoming us and looking after such a special meal for us was truly outstanding. Ivan made our experience that bit more special. Fantastic food, views, wine and service. Worth every cent. 

Thank you Nautika for a wonderful evening.

Great food and location! We ordered the tasting menu👍👍. Very romantic athmosphere.
@Ivan: you rule! Great knowlegde both related to Nautica and also local culture. Very friendly.

Had the best night and overall experience. The food was absolutely incredible with an incredible selection of tastes. Ivan was our waiter and he was fantastic! Genuinely lovely guy with amazing descriptions of each and every component of the meal. Oh and an excellent photographer as well at the end of the meal! 
As a whole it was the best night out I could’ve wished for. So glad me and my partner went to Nautika Restaurant looking over blackwater bay! Definitely one you have to tick off when in Dubrovnik.

Wow! We had the 5 course tasting, and it was phenomenal. Ivan was the most gracious server and truly made our experience memorable! We also had a wonderful sommelier to recommend some fantastic local wine pairings. Please do not miss this gem while you are in Dubrovnik. Be sure to request front row seating when you reserve. You will have a fantastic view of the sea and the Red Keep while you dine. What a fantastic way to celebrate our anniversary.

A truly special place. The service was just incredible, Antonio was so informative, attentive and fun! He added so positively to the whole experience. The food though was the star of the show. Phenomenal - particularly the beef and the lamb. Not to mention the spectacular views. If you want a memorable dinner in Dubrovnik, this is the perfect choice.
Great experience. Antonio was amazing. Fish was spectacular presentation. Perfect night. Couldn’t recommend it more highly.

We've had the pleasure of dining at Nautika for our friends bday! It was truly magnificent: the white glove service, delicious food, breath taking view. We went with their tasting menu with matching wine. Our options consisted of seafood and meat. It was perfect. What really stood out is our waiter Ivan who went above and beyond to make our visit and our friend who's bday it was feel extra special. Thank you for organising 3 different desserts and different wines to go with it. We also wanted to sit at the first raw, which was booked out. Ivan made sure we had that opportunity for our final complementary drink. We will never forget this amazing experience. Thank you.

5 out of 5 doesn’t do this justice. We chose this as our last dinner of our honeymoon, before heading home and just wow!!! I genuinely lack the words to describe the extent of how phenomenal of an experience one evening here was. 

The hospitality of the staff deserves its own review, as does the bar program, and of course, as does the kitchen. 

Damir, the cocktail director is brilliant; curating a cocktail menu just as incredible and expansive as the dinner menu.

Ivan, our server, shines just as bright and only adds to the experience. 

Unfortunately, we head home tomorrow, but can’t wait to return not only to Dubrovnik, but Nautika, specifically. Thank you thank you thank you for a magical and unforgettable night!!

I doubt we will ever have a more picturesque table in a restaurant. The stunning vista was matched by the quality of the food. The cooking and presentation was first class. The staff were hugely knowledgeable and super attentive.

Well worth a visit….
Had a lovely dinner at Nautika over the sunset with my partner, the views were absolutely incredible! Mario and Ivan gave exceptional service, would highly recommend.

Me and my girlfriend saw this online and it lived up to expectations. You pay for the food, service, view, and ambience! Mario and Ivan were incredible waiters and shared their love for travelling and football!

An amazing night, delicious food and definitely Antonio made the experience much more enjoyable. I recommend Nautika completely and of course for hispanophones ask for Antonio for attention. 
A night unforgettable, amazing dinner and Antonio is the best waiter in the world! Really the experience in Nautika was romantic and incredible!

My partner and I had dinner at Nautika when we were visiting Dubrovnik. We ate at a couple of the other restaurants affiliated with the Nautika and loved the food there. Nautika was by far the fanciest! The menu was very diverse and the food we had was great. The atmosphere was very relaxed, perfect after a long day walking the city walls in the sun. The service was unparalleled. Our server, Ivan, was amazing and took great care of us. He had great recommendations for us when we asked and was very attentive. Second to his hospitality are his camera skills and funny jokes! Great experience overall!
Amazing view, outstanding food and wonderful and charming service from Ivan. We couldn’t not have asked for a more beautiful night or better food. Go there!!!
The place is amazing, the food is 100% perfect, and Antonio is more than you need for an excellent dinner. We selected this restaurant for our anniversary.

Today we celebrate our 29 Anniversary, and this place is amazing, and the attention was excellent Antonio our waiter has a high level of knowledge in the art of serving and his recommendations for our dinner were incredible. The place is very nice and the food is of high quality.
Excellent dinner, with beautiful views and even better service by Antonio! Food was great and inventive. Will be back!
Everything was superb and Antonio our waiter was fantastic! Food was excellent and the setting was beautiful. Definitely recommend to anyone who wants to have a superclass dinner.

Restaurant Nautika was supposed to offer fine dining and experience. For us price was not an issue, we just wanted to offer our friend nice diner experience in Dubrovnik. Unfortunately as soon as we arrived hostess was not kind or friendly and this setup the tone for the evening. She even did not walked us through the restaurant, she just seat us at the table in front of the restaurant by the busy crowd of tourists. Food and service were fine but not worth the price. These makes entire evening average except for very expensive bill.
Great service great food. We had a great time here especially with the service by Antonio. We would definitely recommend this restaurant to our family and friends.
Amazing meal, perfect scenery, and stellar service from our waiter Ivan! Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik!

It was an incredible dinner we had at Nautika.
We went there with our Labrador.
The staff was terrific, many thanks especially to our waiter Henry.
We look forward to coming back to Dubrovnik!

We had a lovely family dinner on a day out in Dubrovnik. We were looked after by Antonio for the evening. He explained the courses & the olive oil! It was an experience we will all remember. The food was delicious - we opted for individual courses - mine, the beef was superb. 

A fantastic evening looked after by Antonio. The whole experience highly recommended.
Absolutely exceptional food and service, best beef I’ve ever had. Staff were amazing, especially Antonio who was fantastic all round especially with his help and friendliness. 10/10 would recommend.
ANTONIO was the best !!!!!!! He was great and the experience was the best thing ever! Highly recommend. The food was the most amazing I’ve ever had.
We had such an amazing dinner here. We were served by Antonio he was lovely, very kind and entertaining! The food was also to die for!

Wonderful location, with a very suggestive view. One of the best dinners ever. Exquisite fish, cooked and presented excellently. Everything is taken care of in detail. Perfect Service. Mario, our waiter, deserves a round of applause. It is an expensive restaurant, but it is really worth it.

We had dinner at the restaurant, booked at 6.30pm and stayed until nightfall. The place has a strategic view is wonderful, the food excellent and also the attention. It's a place with traditional style, table with white tablecloth, beautiful

It is with extreme pleasure that I write this review. I have dined in fine dining establishments all over the world but my experience tonight leaves me speechless! Tonight’s dining experience was clearly over and above anything I have had in my 60 plus years.
The table was waiting for us on the outdoor patio with a breathtaking view. The quality and selection of all dishes was beyond anything I have ever encountered. The white glove service performed by Hrvoje was perfection. His suggestions were amazing and on point.

The cost was not inexpensive, but very appropriate for the quality of the food, service and experience. Hrvoje really surprised us with “a little something”at the end of our dining experience, and it was an experience, not a meal.

My recommendation is, if you are planning g a trip to Dubrovnik, you Must Book this in advance as you do not want to miss this gem.

Very good experience with Antonio (Banderes)
Beautiful restaurant set in the best location ! Amazing food and great fun
Excellent evening. Exquisite food, impeccable Service. Thank you Antonio who helped to give this evening a unique character
The location of the restaurant is amazing, right next to West Harbour. The staffs are nice and friendly, the food is fresh and delicious:)
I had the sea bass and soup. The ambiance was 10/10 especially at night. The waitstaff, specifically, Hrvoje, went above and beyond to make this experience so enjoyable. Highly recommend

Nautika Restaurant was an amazing experience. The view itself is worth it, but the food really took it to another level, everything was delicious and beautifully done. What made the night even better was the service. Our waiter, Henrey, was outstanding. Super friendly, attentive, and just made us feel really well looked after. We also got a special treat since we were celebrating our honey moon. Couldn’t have asked for a better experience.
Fantastic views of the sea and the city walls. The food was creative, fresh and delicious. Service was also top notch from Henry and his team.

Where do I start… I visited Nautika this evening with my Boyfriend for my Birthday, everything from start to finish was incredibly special. The view, the delicious food and the exceptional service. Antonio made us feel like the only people in the restaurant, he was warm, approachable and attentive. Antonio has an extensive knowledge of the menu and all things Dubrovnik, which was great as he guided us through the dishes, we had the tasting menu, every dish was nothing short of spectacular. Vinko guided us through the extensive wine menu, he took into account what we liked and provided us with suggestions. The wines he selected for us were perfect and exactly what we wanted. Thank you to Antonio, Vinko and the team here at Nautika for making my birthday one to remember. We will be back!
Incredible evening with lovely food, a great view and brilliant service. Henry gave us a wonderful experience and we would recommend this restaurant to anyone. Would love to come again!
This is a great fine dining experience - great food, great atmosphere. And Hrvoje’s services were great! A true high-class experience!

My wife and I celebrated our 25th wedding anniversary, and so I wanted to treat my wife to something special. We dined at Nautika, where the setting and the view is spectacular. The service from Mario was top notch, and the meal (I had the veal shoulder for my main) was absolutely delicious. There was a sommelier to ensure best possible choice of wine to accompany the meal, so overall the meal experience was fabulous, and something you would expect from a restaurant with 2 Michelin stars. The one disappointment I had was that I had sent a number of emails advising the restaurant of our special occasion, and so on arrival, apart from the reception lady wishing us a happy anniversary, there was no other acknowledgment of any kind from any of the staff - which I feel is disappointing. Overall, a fabulous restaurant in a beautiful setting, but does come with a premium price tag.

Amazing experience. Best dinner we had in Croatia. Definitely recommend coming at least one night you are here. Food was so fresh and experience was 10/10. Antonio was our waiter and he was so wonderful, knowledgeable, and kind.

We had a wonderful evening! The view is absolutely stunning and creates a truly romantic atmosphere – perfect for a dinner for two. The value for money is excellent, and the food was of outstanding quality. A special thanks to Antonio: he is an exceptionally friendly and attentive waiter who made the evening even more enjoyable with his warm personality. We will definitely be coming back!

Great service, our server Antonio couldn't do enough for us. We sat out on the patio and the views were amazing. All the food and drinks were exceptional. If we came back to Dubrovnik we would visit again.
Antonio was so attentive and made our experience really special. The food and drink was to die for and the views were spectacular.

The location is stunning and that is what you are paying for a solid but somewhat underwhelming experience for the price. We were told upon arrival that we would have our table for 2.5 hours and that was all. I wish. We struggled to get out in 3.25 hours. Wines missed the courses they should have been paired with, which is not acceptable at this price point. Ditch the gloves and get the wines to the table with the food. That said our waiters were lovely, I just think they were understaffed for the service they were attempting to provide. The dinner started strong but then just faded with the timing.

The restaurant definitely justified its prices, which are high by world standards. The view is beautiful and unforgettable, as if you are merging with the past of this ancient city. The food is excellent and beautifully presented. The beef tartare, gambero rosso and veal cheek were the most delicious, although the lamb was also prepared superbly. Professional and friendly service keeps everything under control.

Fantastic service by our good waitress Henry (Hrvoje). The food was also very good! Very good wine that was recommended by a wine knower at the restaurant. 
Fantastic view and a very good experience! Highly recommended.

Stunning views and a beautiful experience. In my opinion, this was worth it to try once, but I probably wouldn’t go back a second time. Also, if you are budget conscious, this is probably not the place for you, as the prices are not cheap and the portions are very small. Very fancy though.
Delicious food and wine and the service was 10/10. Our waiter Mario was absolutely amazing! Definitely coming back. This is a must if you are visiting Dubrovnik!

Fantastic service, amazing scenery and even better food! Henry was brilliant - we listened to all of his recommendations and were so impressed (particularly by the Shrimp Gnocchi and the cocktails to finish our meal). Left feeling very happy and we cannot wait to tell our friends!!

Went with my mum and it was better than expected.
The service, the views, the food, everything was fantastic.
One of the best restaurants (if not THE best) we tried during our trip to Dubrovnik.

Really good food and amazing service. Great spot for a dinner date, and good view of the city walls and sea view. Hrvoje (Henry) was extremely polite, friendly and helpful. I would really recommend this place!
Beautiful view with even better food. Topped off with flawless attentive service from Hrvoje, he really made our night special.
We were here for my husband’s birthday. Our waiter Henry couldn't have been more charming. Such an incredible setting, and the food and wine were exquisite. Highly recommend.
Unforgettable evening, food, place and above all excellent care. I would recommend it without hesitation. Deserved Michelin star
They kindly upgraded our table to the terrace. Food was delicious - we got complimentary dessert as well. Antonio was very friendly, informative and professional.

An unforgettable experience from start to finish. Each dish was beautifully presented and bursting with flavor.

Special thanks to our waiter, Antonio, who made the evening even more memorable. His knowledge, warmth, and impeccable timing elevated the whole experience.

Flawless service, stunning ambiance, and exceptional food—definitely worth the hype!!

Beautiful view and great food! Especially the foie gras! Love here and the amazing hospitality:)
Would love to come back again! Antonio is great!
Superb service from Antonio! Food and the view was lovely! Definitely recommend, especially for special occasions!!

My husband and I had the most magical dinner at Nautika. We were seated first row of the outdoor terrace which overlooks the walls and the fort. The service and food were excellent allowing us to enjoy cuisine at its finest. The dinner was layered and every part was a special moment. We feel so fortunate to have had this unforgettable dinner experience!
We came with my partner for his birthday. The food was amazing and our waiter Antonio was brilliant. Highly recommend!! Thank you ☺️
A lovely evening. Refined and tasty cuisine. Antonio was very attentive to our every need (and it was not obvious since I was pregnant and there were so many foreclosures in the choice of dishes).

The magical atmosphere whisks you away for a fairytale experience by the water. Seated on the outdoor terrace promises great views of the fort and city walls. Our server, Ivan, and somalier, Darko, provided a personal touch throughout our 5-course seafood tasting. The wines were paired beautifully and complimented each dish. We left very satiated, yet wanting more. A "must do" on your Dubrovnik visit! I give it 5 🌟 rating!
Went with my family and the server Antonio made our experience very special! Very good food and great service. Worth it!

Hrana, piće i usluga su bili vrhunski od početka do kraja. Svaki konobar s kojim smo imali kontakt bio je informisan, ljubazan i izuzetno pažljiv. Posebne pohvale za Antu, koji je strpljivo odgovarao na sva naša pitanja i učinio da ovo iskustvo bude nezaboravno! Posebno nas je oduševilo to što su osoblje zapamtili naša imena — predivan detalj. Pogled je nevjerovatan, a ambijent savršen. Usluga i kvalitet vrijede svake marke i ovo je definitivno mjesto koje morate posjetiti ako ste u Dubrovniku! — The food, drinks and service were phenomenal! All of the servers were very informed and helpful, incredibly polite and very attentive! Special shoutout to Ante who answered all our questions & made the experience one to remember! The servers even remember your names?!?! Great view & great setting overall. Totally worth the price & is a must visit if you’re going to Dubrovnik.
Amazing food, spectacular views, impecable service! Worth the visit! Antonio our server made the experience even more special!

Superb service, food and view. You can’t get better, even better if you get Antonio as your waiter. Amazing 
Ensure you get dessert, the cheesecake!

Nautika was one of the best dining experiences we’ve had in Dubrovnik. From the moment we sat down, the service was warm, attentive, and genuinely thoughtful. Our waiter was fantastic! Ante was knowledgeable, friendly, and had a great sense of creativity. He told us "feel at home" and he did not disappoint.

We started with a Kir Royale, and I have to say, they made it unlike any other place we've tried, It was perfectly balanced, elegant, and refreshing. They lined the rim with honey and used their homemade creme de cassis. We also had the Black Prince, which was just as bold and flavorful as the name suggests.

But the highlight was when I told our waiter I was in the mood for either rakija or gin, and he returned with a custom cocktail that blended both. It was incredible! Totally unexpected and perfectly crafted. That kind of attention and care really made the evening feel special.

If you're in Dubrovnik and want a place that takes pride in both its service and creativity, Nautika is absolutely worth a visit. It's at least 30€ per person but the quality and service is worth it. I made a reservation to celebrate a birthday so we'll definitely be back.
Incredible atmosphere and even better service - Ante was exceptional, and delivered world class service. Cocktails were incredible - specifically the kir royale
Antonio didbsjdbwjebdkendjsksnsksjsbd snxksbsjsnxbd sna Annandale x mandalas. S small and a lla d low d low. S palms. Loans Kamala Kamala

This fabulous restaurant is right across from the Hilton Imperial. We did not have reservations but saw it as we were walking by. It is truly a stunning restaurant. They were very gracious and sat us outside. We were at an elevated table which without reservations we were lucky to get. The prime spots are right at the wall. The view from our table was very good as well. 

We started with lovely cocktails and shared shrimp risotto for a starter. Their bread is delicious. We each had fresh fish that was wonderful. Beautifully plated and presented with garnishes. Service is white glove, professional wait staff. 

 We were seated in front of a couple with their teenage daughter. She was very hyper, and disruptive. The Maitre D saw this and asked if we wanted to move. He took me into the restaurant, which is lovely upstairs to another lovely room, my husband stayed at our table to see if I wanted to move. I decided not to as that patio is absolutely magical. It's nice that they are that attentive and wanting their customers to have the best time. Most places wouldn't even consider doing this.
We saw these people the next night in old town. The girl was jumping on walls and running madly all over. Parents weren't that young, I feel sorry for them. Why they took her to Nautika is unclear. She spent a lot of time wrapped in a blanket and going under the table. No manners at all. Sad.

I highly recommend Nautika for anyone wanting a special evening with the best service, food and atmosphere.
Recommend 100%! The view, the food, and the service is to the max. Mario assisted us with our dinner and he was the best! Definitely would be coming back here to eat

This was by far such an amazing experience! Mario, you went above and beyond on what we were expecting out of this dinner experience. Our meals were thoroughly explained, and made us feel welcomed. He helped us celebrate my friend’s birthday dinner and made it extra special. This is what a restaurant experience by the sea should be! 

Definitely impressed by how all of the waiters were in synced and worked together to provide a pleasant and welcoming experience to guests.
We had the best experience at Nautika. Views were beautiful, food was amazing. And Mario gave the best service! Made me feel very special for my birthday. Would highly recommend.

Excellent spot for a romantic fancy dinner out. We think we had the best seats in the house on the outside terrace. Hrjove, our waiter, was above and beyond. He was knowledgeable of the food and wine and the origins. The experience was a must do and the food was delicious as well. Out of all the courses the lamb was superior!

This was a wonderful spot to enjoy our second evening in Dubrovnik where we celebrated my dad’s birthday. The service from the moment we walked through the door to the end was incredible. Very attentive, especially considerate to my dietary restrictions. Antonio and the whole team was wonderful. We will most definitely return!
Antonio was amazing as well as the food! We had a perfect view from the upstairs balcony. It was a windy night but the staff was amazing and very attentive. Thank you for a great evening
Absolutely incredible food, drinks, view and setting! Service was brilliant by Antonio and we had a wonderful time the whole 3 hours of being here!
A wonderfull evening at Nautika, food, beverages and service absolutely immaculate. Waiter “Henry” being the highlight of the evening! Well-spoken, likeable, positive and present, flawless service.

The food was spectacular!!! Very unique and on top of it we tried scorpionfish which was grilled to perfection . Above all, Antonio our server made our experience unforgettable with his friendliness and knowledge. 
Highly recommend!!!!
Loved the setting upstairs, more private and comfortable. Very nice service and the food was fantastic! Spectacular views,
Beautiful dinner! Had the best seat in the house even as a solo traveller - they made me feel so welcome! Hrjove, my waiter, was lovely and super on it!

Everything about the experience felt truly special. The setting is nothing short of breathtaking perched right above the sea with unobstructed views of the ocean and the fort, watching the sunset here felt magical. 

The live piano music drifting through the air only added to the atmosphere, creating a relaxed yet refined ambiance.

A special mention must go to our server, Henry, whose service was truly above and beyond. He was warm, attentive, and incredibly knowledgeable. We were so impressed by the olive oil served with the bread that I asked where I could purchase it and to my surprise, Henry kindly offered it to us on the house, a gesture that genuinely touched us and made the experience feel even more personal and generous.

Everything from the flawless service to the views, food, and the elegant ambiance came together to create an unforgettable night. Without a doubt, this was one of the best dinners I’ve ever had. If you’re in Dubrovnik and looking for an amazing dining experience, Nautika is a must.
Beautiful views. Live pianist. Fine dining at its best. Henry our waiter was faultless. Highly recommend.to anyone that visits old town Dubrovnik.

My wife and I had such an amazing time dining at Nautika. The setting is out of this world with the fortress just a stone throw away, but what truly made the night special was the exceptional service from Hrvoje.

From the moment we sat down, Hrvoje made us feel genuinely welcome. He was friendly, attentive, and had the perfect balance of professionalism and warmth. He took the time to walk us through the menu, share personal recommendations, and checked in at just the right moments. It felt like being hosted by an old friend.

Food was delicious, ambiance was great, and service even better. Thank you Hrvoje!
Beautiful environment, fantastic food! Besides amazing food, the service is excellent! Hrvoje was super attentive and excellent at the service! Super valid visit here
Fantastic food! We were presented with entries and dessert as courtesy of the chef!!! Hrvoje served us and was extremely friendly and helpful

This was one of the most amazing dining experiences of our lives! Antonio was incredible and each dish was a credit was a credit to the chef restaurant. Would recommend for any special occasion in Dubrovnik. Thank you so much.

The food, the service, the atmosphere, the scenery, everything was good. In particular, Antonio, who was in charge of our table, was very kind and entertained us with his humor. They noticed the little things right away and we enjoyed a very pleasant dinner. Also, when I come to Dubrovnik, I want to thank you.

I had pre booked this restaurant, they did phone to confirm we would be attending. The location was one of the best in the city over looking the sea, and the fort. All the servers were well dressed and definitely at the top end of fine dining. I wasn't unfortunately at the time (under dressed for me) but I was not judged. We all pay and are there for a service. The food didn't disappoint and was exceptional top quality, which was expected for the price and the type of service given. My husband had sea bream and I had veggie risotto, along with one of the best desserts I have probably tasted. We have eaten in some top Michelin Star restaurants and they were divine. The waiter was lovely, friendly but not too much in your face. Water glass kept being topped up, crumbs cleared off table in-between courses, ticked. The toilets were at a high standard and there was also a pianist playing in the main entrance area.

The most spectacular, romantic, magical view ever! The service was out of this world. Thank you Henry! The drinks were deconstructed, strong, and amazing. The food was perfection, love the live music in the lobby! What a special place!

Whilst this isn't our first experience of fine dining, it was our first taster menu.

We booked to eat here a few months in advance as part of our trip to Croatia for our honeymoon.

What can we say, this place met and also exceeded our expectations! The view, the service, the beautiful food. Hrvoje (Henry) was our waiter, he was very knowledgeable about our drinks and made us feel welcome. 

There wasn't too much fuss (just as we like it) but enough to make our evening/experience at Nautika memorable.

Thank you!

Blair & Paul :)

We had a lovely evening. The view is special of course, the service is great and the food is tasty. The prices are absolutely extortionate though and for that reason we just wouldn’t recommend it. The mains are around €65+ which we were prepared to pay but tiny tiny starters, all at around €50 was ridiculous. Deserts at € 25 +. Water (which, by the way is free in the fountains all over the city) was € 9.50!!!! Cocktails €25+. They also take a € 200 no show deposit. We had nice meal but the food was nothing special and definitely not our best meal in Dubrovnik. 

We felt like we were just being rinsed for the view and treated like tourist cash cows, left a bad impression. This place is not value for money.

One of the best restaurants in Dubrovnik, consider booking your dinner well in advance to make sure you find your place. This restaurant offers the most beautiful view of the sea surrounded by the ramparts. The service is faultless and Antonio our waiter made us live a timeless time.
Simply amazing! Antonio’s service was spectacular and the food is one of the best I ever had. You must try the tartar!!!’

Absolutely outstanding experience at Restaurant Nautika! The food was exceptional — every dish beautifully presented and full of flavor. The service (Antonio) was professional, attentive, and friendly. The location is stunning, with a breathtaking view of the sea and the city walls. Perfect for a romantic dinner or a special occasion. Highly recommended!

We were fortunate to have a table right at the edge, overlooking the water which was perfect--- five stars. The food was excellent (five stars) but amazingly expensive for tiny portions (one star). If you don't care about cost, then this is the place for you. However, there are other equally good restaurants for a far more reasonable price.
From the welcome to leaving, the experience was first class. Impeccable service and exceptional food, whatever you choose you’ll be left impressed. Definitely worth the visit!

Nautika was absolutely stunning. From the service to the food to the incredible atmosphere Nautika is worth every penny. And our server Antonio was truly impressive. He was polite, knowledgable, funny, and just an all around incredible young man.

Food was great as I expected. Ordered the meat tasting menu plus tortellini with mushrooms and they were incredible. Wine list is impressive but instead of the bottle I ordered various selections by glasses even such paring wine/food wasn’t on the list. The selection was good but served in very heavy glasses - they were from Spigelau but not the level such restaurant should have. Only the burgundy one was fine …
Amazing service, stunning location, beautiful food. A truly fabulous 5 course tasting plate, beautifully presented.

Henry and Antônio received us very well! Perfect place to eat great food and enjoy the castle views! The romantic ambiance is remarkable, I would especially recommend this place for someone seeking this vibe.

This dining experience was truly exceptional. The cocktails were exquisite, the shrimp starter was the best I’ve ever had, and the veal was exceptionally tender. I was particularly impressed by the menu’s emphasis on locally sourced ingredients. From beginning to end, this was an incredible meal, expertly guided by the recommendations of our waiter, Hrvoje “Henry.” His extensive knowledge and professionalism transformed our dining experience into a truly memorable one.

I had tried to make online dinner reservations with this restaurant group (Nautika Collection) for any of their restaurants as we weren't picky and they all seemed fantastic. Website would show availability and then I would receive an email directly from the restaurant saying they actually didn't have any availability, sorry. Super irritating. But then something fantastic happened, I actually received a response from Anita who said they were sad to hear this and would love to look personally for a dinner reservation at any of the restaurants. And she did and it turned out to be a front row table at Nautika. I love how she was able to turn an irritating issue into a super scrumptious night.

The place was a fine dining place with a little expensive menu but offers a whole experience with fancy shows and delicious food.

We as a Turkish couple received beautiful service from Hrvoje Bilic he explained everything so smooth tried to align everything for us in the way we will like( changed our fixed menu dessert with something he thinks that will be better, added some fancy writings to our cakes to celebrate our anniversary), such a great guy, you can request him specifically
Perfect place for a couple's evening, but not only. We ate very well, the place is a show and the staff is friendly and prepared. We were followed by Antonio, kind and considerate. We recommend!
Nautika is a must do experience! Best meal we had on our entire trip! Make sure to request a table on the water in Hrvoje’s “Henry’s” section!

A beautifull place, delicious food, and amazing service. Thank you, Henry, for the wonderful hospitality — we’re so glad we had the chance to meet you. I couldn’t have dreamed of a better place to celebrate!

Everything except the food was fantastic, the view, the location and the service. The food was very disappointing, especially considering the price.

 We had the set fish menu and only the desserts stood out (they were amazing). Also, the sommelier recommended us a wine that was a ”fantastic pairing with seabass” when the menu didnt have a seabass dish. 

Our waiter Henry was fantastic though!

Amazing food, amazing views & amazing service. Henry was just the best waiter and the icing on top of the cake to a wonder dinner experience. Cannot recommend enough and would absolutely come again if we’re ever back in Dubrovnik.
Superb place with a beautiful life, Henri our waiter was very kind and made us spend a very nice culinary experience.

Amazing experience with a beautiful view of the Adriatic Sea, Old City Walls, and Fort Lovrijenac. The food was delicious, and our waiter Henry made the meal much more pleasant with his recommendations and additions to our dinner. Great service, great food, great experience overall.
Thank you Henry for being so attentive, personable and professional. We had a lovely night. Plus the food was incredible!

The dinner was amazing!! Everything was soo flavorful and exquisite. However the view was one and a million. Henry gave us great service and was very helpful, very english friendly. This is a must stop if you're visiting.

Nautika – Dubrovnik
Stunning views, flawless service, and a refined tasting menu that celebrates Adriatic flavors. Highlights: tartare. Fish soup. Seabass. A must for a special night in Dubrovnik.

We came here for our 25th Wedding Anniversary, and it did not disappoint. From the moment we arrived we were well looked after by our waiter Andrej (I think) and Josef the wine waiter. Andrej explained what every single dish was, and was funny and charming. My husband had the fish tasting menu, and as I’m vegan, they did a special vegan tasting menu for me. Everything was absolutely delicious. We will definitely come back again!
This was an incredible dinner and one of the best meals we have had out of a few Michelin star locations. It was a delicious meal with inventive options. Thank you to Henry for a great evening!!
Definitely the highlight meal of our trip! The staff were all lovely and the food was simply delicious. Highly recommend the tuna and the view is also stunning
My wife and I had a great time celebrating our honeymoon. Henry had impeccable suggestions, and the service helped make the meal.
We ordered the fresh fish cooked in salt, which was spectacular – we’ve never tried anything like this! Plus, the restaurant’s view onto the water pairs beautifully with the elegant dishes.
We spent our 10th anniversary here. The views cannot be beat. The service with Henry was perfect! The food was delicious. Very pricy but well worth it
Hrvoje Was an excellent waiter! View was impeccable. Food was delicious. Hrvoje also was very polite and knowledgeable of the menu! 5/5!

This is a very special occasion dinner. The seating on the patio is exquisite. Unfortunately, we didn't know about the front patio which is where you would want to sit, but they did give us a small patio table upstairs which was still lovely. It's a Michelin star restuarant and food was very good. They couldn't have tried harder to make our dining experience special. I would go back and insist on outside patio by the front of the restaurant!

Starting from the very beginning: reservation for 2 of us at 21:30 and we have the table till 00:15. I’ve never, ever, ever had so long time to enjoy a dinner in a fine dining. Amazing. 
We arrived, table ready at 21:30 sharp, best table with sea view. 
Then, starting the experience the waiter Mr. Antonio made it simply PERFECT! He took care of us in every little detail. 
Food was a dream, tasty, delicious, excellent. 
The place is 10000/10 and it worth it. 
Bravo to all the staff for making our night such wonderful, but specially bravo Antonio for taking care of us. 
Definitely we recommend it!!!

Great views, but The food was even better. Antonio was such a great waiter who explained everything we ate perfectly. Everything from the appetizers to the desserts was unbelievable!!! Best restaurant in Dubrovnik!!!

Really fine food and fine service, excellent waiting by Henry.
Dubrovnik was a wonderful experience and our meal in Nautika crowned our stay.
Benny M
Amazing food and atmosphere, and service by Hrvoje. Changing scenery from evening to night is stunning, which deserves visit!

Blown away. I heard a lot about this restaurant and still had no idea how amazing it would be. We had the 5 course tasting menu beginning with Ante, he is incredibly warm, knowledgeable and was the perfect representation of a well respected fine dining establishment. We spent 4 courses with him and he made our night, we absolutely loved him. It’s our mini honeymoon, so they offered to move us for the final course over to the other side of the patio for the final course and a different viewpoint of the amazing scenery. There, we met Antonio who was clearly an absolute pro. He was funny and personable and made the end to our night so special with some extra desserts and drinks. I cannot tell you how amazing every course is, everything we had was incredible - special mention to the veal cheek. 

I can’t wait to come back next time we’re here for our anniversary!

Wonderful experience!!! Our dinner was amazingly great! Flavors were very unique and delicious! Henry, our server, treated us like royalty! They even provided a surprise dessert without nuts special for us! Highly recommend! 

Darlene and Steve 
Naples, Florida USA
Excellent service by Antonio, Ivan and Tomislav. Absolutely delicious shrimp appetizer and tortellini. High quality ad sophistication. Thank you!
Incredible dinner with a fantastic view and an excellent waiter, Banderas (Antonio 😉). You would be so lucky to have him as a waiter!!

Unforgettable dinner at Nautika!
The views are incredible — right on the water with the old city in the background. The food was delicious (especially the seafood), and the atmosphere was elegant but relaxed. Huge shoutout to Hrvoje, our waiter — he was absolutely amazing and made us feel so welcome. He was warm, attentive, and made the evening even more special.
We had a Wonderful couples dinner. Beautiful view, amazing food, great service. Highly recommend in downtown Dubrovnik.
The whole dinner was great! Antonio our waiter was the best to ever do it! He was phenomenal. Would highly recommend to come here on your stay in Dubrovnik.
beautiful vie, very delicious food, lovely staff (Herve) and live piano music :) thanks to the whole team, would really recommend

The environment and the service were excellent, especially the service of Antonio. He is humorous and attentive.

The sunset view was great. Make you feel very romantic

Wonderful evening in a lovely location. Food and service were exceptional, showcasing local ingredients and wines. If you are looking for a place to enjoy a very special meal in Dubrovnik this is an excellent choice!
Great place with incredible view!The staff was very professional and kind!Taste is perfect! Thank you about this magic!!

We had an amazing dinner at this restaurant, everything about the experience was first class. Location is stunning, best we experienced in Dubrovnik. We went for the tasting menu as a family which was just amazing - every dish went so well together and was really well explained by our waiter Henry. Special shout out to him, he was so great and lovely to chat to him about Scotland and Dundee!
Absolutely wonderful experience. The food the service top notch. ! Not just for the view but for the amazing food and service !

Disappointed, chef just not up to this price point. We went for our anniversary and got the five course tasting and wine pairing. For over 400E for two, it was just not of the caliber you would expect both in terms of the food and service. The biggest letdown in the service was the wine pairing. We are very interested in wines, and with a wine pairing you usually get enthusiastic and knowledgeable descriptions of the wine with local context, and why it is paired with the specific food. The sommelier never looked us in the eye, just recited a few facts, seemed to be in a rush to get away, basically calling it in instead of trying to make it a nice foodie experience. The bread service was also both odd and underwhelming. They presented a tray of five different flavors of rolls, but all bland with the same texture and softer crust, they looked like they came out of a supermarket. With this they brought olive oil in a bottle and placed it on the table. We didn't see them again for quite a while and we each ate a couple of pieces of bread. Then with the first course they brought a different bottle of olive oil and explained why it was better. They did this with each course, but it made no sense because we had already eaten our fill of bread. Ultimately they brought 4-5 different bottles of olive oil to the table. If this was meant to be an olive oil tasting, they should have stated that at the beginning explaining that they will bring other bottles throughout the meal--we could have saved the bread and tried the different oils-- or they could have brought them all at once and explained the concept. Also, having five bottles on the table doesn't seem very elegant. The food was the biggest problem, nothing memorable/creative at all and nothing showing the marks of a great chef. Usually at a meal like this (and we've done many), the food is surprising, the plating exciting, each course is a joy of culinary discovery. As an example, the beef cheek was presented in a dark gravy, with brown hazelnut mashed potatoes, garnished with a mini carrot that had been fried in a brown crumb coating. The carrot was overcooked, the potatoes confusing (why?), the beef mundane-- no better than any beef cheek I've had in an average priced restaurant. And the all brown plating? It is so fun to discover a new chef and see how they made their mark but this is not that experience and definitely not a place for foodies. We actually liked their sister restaurant Gradska kavana Arsenal far better. We had an ocean front table with just as lovely a view, the bread was far superior, the food/chef was a lot better, the service more warm and on point. The veal I ordered was not only plated more appealingly and professionally, but perfectly cooked and better than any course at Nautika. Our meal there with a great bottle of local wine was $130E for two. Save your money. For a truly one of a kind dining experience try Local in their brand new old town location and watch them cook Peka over an open fire.

Caution: sneaky Somm. Most wines by the glass are 16-20 but there are some that are 59. The somm will do his best to sneak them in. This is after we pointed out one that we said was too expensive. He got us on the other that we didn’t catch. 

Everything else was great. Location is truly amazing. Shame that the somm left a bad taste when we got the bill.
Ante our waiter was so awesome and kind! The food was delicious! It was a great fine dining restaurant. We had a great time in the view was amazing at the small Terrace on the upper floor.

This spot was good and would recommend. The service was amazing definitely smaller portions and emphasis on the fine dining. The atmosphere was relaxing with a beautiful view. Ante was our server and would definitely recommend him. He was very knowledgeable and made our experience at this restaurant very enjoyable.
The view, food, service and atmosphere are really nice. We have a wonderful dinner and trip here thanks to Ante and Nautika.

Recommended by locals. ㄩˊㄏㄣˇㄐㄧㄥˉ艷
煮法ㄐㄧㄢˇㄉㄢˉㄉㄢˋㄨㄟˋㄉㄠˋㄏㄣˇㄊㄜˋ別 ㄔˉㄉㄜㄔㄨˉ來ㄏㄣˇㄩㄥˋㄒㄧㄣˉ
Also give us blanket to stay warm and also heater ! Tap water is provided, which is really considerate.

We had a great experience dining in this high end restaurant on one of our nights in Dubrovnik. We were seated on the terrace next to the sea and it couldn’t have been a more gorgeous setting. The service was impeccable and the food simple but delicious. We drank a delicious bottle of Posip, which became our go to wine for the holiday!

Our server, Antonio was polished and personable! The presentation and flavors of each dish were impeccable. The setting of the restaurant is stunning. Nautika lives up to the reputation. Highly recommend for a memorable meal!

Visited for dinner in May 2025. Our waiter Henry was very attentive & friendly. We had the fish & meat tasting menus, both of which were delicious & well presented. A very extensive wine list! Would recommend.
Overpriced for the food they serve. Not even near our expectations. There are other restaurants with better quality on the food.

This restaurant is really one of the best in Dubrovnik. On the terrace you have a wonderful view of the water, the castle and the swallows. The food is exceptional and so is the service. We will always remember the evening.
Wonderful dinner. Great service (thank you Antonio!), grand views, and superb food. My favorite was the fresh fish. Highly recommended.
I had a wonderful experience at Nautika. The view is gorgeous. Everyone is so kind and Mario gave the best suggestions. One of the best meals and experiences I've ever had.
Ante was great and food was amazing! All the staff were very knowledgeable about the food and wine. Would recommend to people visiting Dubrovnik.

This was an incredible dinner. Our server, Ante, was the perfect addition to our night. He recommended fantastic meals that fit our expectations and explained the food beautifully and descriptively. He and the staff made our night!
A graceful and seductive place with a beautiful view of the sea, especially in spring when the temperature is not too high. Food is a work of art. Service is at the highest level
Hrvoja was our waiter and everything was excellent. Everything was 5 star, from the view, to the service, to the food. Definitely an experience I'd recommend! Odlično!!!
We came for our one year wedding anniversary and could not be more delighted with our experience. Exceptional service, food, and ambiance. Highly recommend!

Honestly, one of the best dining experiences of my life. From the location overlooking the water and the castle, to the decor and way table is laid, to the music and most of all- rhe friendly, prompt and attentive service - everything was immaculate. Especially Antonio and Josip went above and beyond, thank you so much. Antonio even found a charger for my phone and lifted my spirits with his great energy. Josip found a great table for me. The wine was served by Darko and Vinko, both very friendly. The overall ambience is special. I tried the first soup and sea-bass, the fish is fresh and tasty. 

This is a brilliant place. Must try if you’re in Dubrovnik. I’m glad I decided to visit here. Thank you to the staff of Nautika.

Dinner with tasting menu overlooking breathtaking Fortezza San Lorenzo.
Special service with the waiter Antonio, nice and professional 
Highly recommended

fantastic place, the sixth place among the most romantic restaurants in the world is truly deserved.
crazy location as the meeting with the waiter Antonio a friendly polyglot and smiling local that does not fail to put you at ease even in such a refined restaurant.
exquisite dinner I highly recommend it?” I would like to go back to see the sunset.
experience recommended and to be repeated.
Antonio was awesome! His recommendations were spot on, the view was perfect, everything we had was amazing! What a perfect night!

Booked a reservation here for the view and WOW the food was just as incredible. Ante was a generous, attentive and thoughtful waiter. We took every food suggestion he gave for dinner and dessert and it completely blew away our expectations! Also…. I personally shattered a wine glass over the table, Ante and other staff could not have been more kind, quick and discrete in cleaning the mess I made. So many delicious food tastings compliments of the restaurant, so unique and delicious. Highly recommend booking first row seating for an incredibly romantic evening (:
Love Mario’s service. He’s so kind and I will definitely come back! The environment is so good. Blue hour is sooo beautiful, definitely choose terrance seat!

Mario Gujinovic is amazing, and he helps us spend really really great time here. Thanks a lot to Mario! Really made my day. 

The food and the service is perfect, me and my friends truly enjoy everything. Really lovely and memorable night.

Thank u so much Mario, he is really nice and recommended everyone to come here enjoy the view the food and the service.

I recommend the second floor seats!

This was an all round awesome experience. The food was delicious, and the service was perfect! Everybody was so kind and they made the experience so personable and pleasurable. The staff were so kind and they made us feel so welcome. The food was absolutely delicious as well. Worth every penny! We can’t say enough great things about this place! Special thanks to Antonio and his team who were so kind to us!!!
Antonio is very attentive and very charismatic. He also knows 5 languages. Truly an amazing experience. I would 100% percent recommend.
This was a wonderful spot for a relaxing and elevated dinner. Has one of the most beautiful views of Dubrovnik. The service was also impeccable.

Lovely restaurant with a view, book early to be on the first tier. The food, service and recommended local wines were delicious. The most expensive meal we had all weekend but well worth it. We went for the taster menu and each course was lovely.

We had a memorable evening at Nautika, our first night in Dubrovnik. The setting is undeniably impressive, with panoramic views of the sea and Dubrovnik’s city walls providing a beautiful backdrop for dinner.

The food was carefully prepared and well presented. Highlights included the shrimp starter, which was fresh and flavorful, and the sea bass, which was cooked just right. Each dish was thoughtfully plated, and the pacing of the meal felt relaxed and unhurried.

Our server, Antonio, stood out for his professionalism, friendliness, and insight. His recommendations—for both wine and food—were excellent and added a personal touch to the experience without being over the top.

Overall, Nautika offers refined dining in a stunning location, with attentive service and a strong focus on detail. It’s a great choice for a special evening in Dubrovnik.

If you’re visiting Dubrovnik, dining at Nautika is an absolute must. The views are nothing short of breathtaking—perched right on the edge of the Adriatic, with a stunning backdrop of the city walls and the sea. The food? Absolutely exceptional. Every dish was bursting with unique flavors and beautifully presented, making for a truly memorable dining experience.

We were lucky to have Antonio as our server—his attentiveness, knowledge, and warmth elevated the evening even further. He made us feel welcome from the moment we arrived and gave thoughtful recommendations that made the meal even more special.

Pair all that with perfectly crafted drinks and impeccable service, and it’s safe to say this was one of the best meals we’ve had while traveling. Highly, highly recommend.

Exceptionally nice location & sublimely good food but TREMENDOUSLY friendly welcome and caring waiting staff!
Special thanks to Antonio for the overly friendly service.

If you’re looking for a fine dining experience in Dubrovnik this is an absolute MUST. This truly was a dining experience from the immaculate service (Mario was fantastic), presentation of courses and of course taste of food and drinks. We had the Seafood Trio and Shrimp to start and the White Fish Fillet for the main as well as some homemade bread and little appetizer samplers that were incredible. Yes, it is pricey but, definitely worth it! Bonus, views are lovely overlooking the fort, sea cliffs and city walls.
First-class restaurant giving a first-class dinner. Every euro of our bill — €339 — was worth it; staff kindness was a +.
My experience was amazing!! Antonio was excellent. The food was so delicious and they made feel at home. Thank you Nautika staff for making me feel like a princess!! Will be back for sure :)

An outstanding meal with excellent food and wine set in one of the best locations we have dined at in Europe. The terrace setting is stunning. Attentive and very pleasant staff added to a fantastic meal. The shrimp risotto has to be one of the best starters I have ever had. Will be top of our list when we return to Dubrovnik

Absolutely amazing experience! From the minute they seated us at the seaside table, to our very last order. Besides the food being extremely delectable, our server, Antonio, was exceptionally attentive to our every need and did not fail to explain any/every thing to us. He brought us post- dinner “Croatian medicine,” which was a cherry on top for the entire experience. I cannot recommend the entire experience more. It was phenomenal!
Wonderful food, amazing view with sunset. Live pianist. Staff very attentive throughout especially our waiter Henry who was fantastic.

We had dinner at Nautika on our second night in Dubrovnik, and it set the bar incredibly high. The view alone is worth it—perched right by the sea, overlooking Fort Lovrijenac and the city walls. It’s hard to imagine a more beautiful setting for dinner.

We had the tasting menu and the food was just as impressive. Also, service from our server Antonio was attentive but never pushy. A little pricey, but you’re paying for a full experience—location, quality, and atmosphere all delivered.

I had a pleasant 5 course tasting meal at Nautika. It is one of a kind experience by the coast. Our lead server Antonio is super attentive and make everything is done right and explained each dish ingredients. The team of Nautika is also providing Michelin level of professional service and made me felt welcome and comfortable while dinning in. Not to mention the incredible terrace with view. Must try when you are in Dubrovnik.
Excellent restaurant before entering the Pile Gate. The food was delicious and the service was outstanding. Would highly recommend it.

The service is absolutely wonderful. Having a pianist is a lovely touch the restrooms are excellent. The views are wonderful.

The food is good although we have had better in all of the other top restaurants in Dubrovnik. I give it 4 1/2 stars out of five. In some cases we have been highly impressed by the cuisine at other restaurants. This visit we were impressed by everything except the cuisine. They are in a terrific position, however I see this very much as a tourist destination for that reason. 

If you are visiting Dubrovnik for the first time, I highly recommend dining in this restaurant. When it comes to superb dining, there are a few better restaurants also with great views.

Having said that 4 1/2 out of five is pretty good.

Excellent food and service by Ante, looked after us superbly.

Food is first class and the view is breathtaking. 

It was my husbands birthday and they surprised him with a lovely desert!
Food was amazing and the view over the water was beautiful! Ante, our server for the night, was incredible, entertaining, and extremely knowledgeable! 10/10
Wonderful dinner! The beef fillet was tender and flavorful, and the cherry dessert was the perfect sweet finish. Great food, ambiance, and service by Antonio—highly recommend!
Everything available on the menu was something new and exciting for us to try. Anton took time to explain how each dish was prepared…. Thank You, Anton and the wonderful staff

What an amazing experience, we visited for the first night of our holiday celebrating our 20th wedding anniversary, and we were made to feel so special, they communicated on email with my wife to get us a table on the outside wall with views of the harbour and castle walls, the food was incredible, the waiter (he let us call him Henry as his Croatian name was tough for us to say) explained every meal, was really friendly and brought 2 plates for every meal as we wanted to share. The sommelier found a Slovenian wine that matched our normal taste (and it was superb!). Then at the end, stuffed and too full for desert, he brought out a plate of mini deserts compliments of the restaurant with Happy Anniversary piped in chocolate. It was a fabulous evening and we couldn’t recommend this restaurant more for a special treat (it isn’t cheap but you won’t regret a single penny!). Thank you, we will be back!
The food and the dining experience from start to finish was fantastic. Amazing attention to detail and great service. Excellent seafood and matching wines
Lovely dinner - fabulous grilled fish for dinner with a lovely wine. Fantastic views and lovely atmosphere - amazing place.

Superb dining experience in a majestic setting. The wine pairing was on point and the food was stellar with the attention to detail and the level of service make for a luxury and sophisticated experience

Nautika is a beautiful restaurant with a million dollar view. But the real beauty is the dining experience. Delicious food. Incredible staff - knowledgeable and friendly and oh so professional. I couldn’t be happier with my dining experience. Extra special shoutout to my server, Ante.

The most incredible dinner … exquisite tenderloin … seared tuna …. Scallops with truffles and beer soaked cauliflower carpaccio. Our server, Ante, was professional, personable and provided perfect timing for an elegant dinner. The ambiance and setting on top of the walls of Dubrovnik was outstanding. A night to remember!
Spectacular food, elegant and approachable, presented proudly to be enjoyed while drenched by a gorgeous backdrop. Ante, our outstanding server, was the perfect host.

Our evening at Nautika was nothing short of extraordinary…..From the moment we arrived, we were treated with the utmost care and attention by the staff and especially the gracious Ante, whose service was impeccable throughout the evening…. The cuisine was a revelation—each dish an exquisite blend of flavours, prepared and presented with the highest level of artistry…..

The setting, with its breathtaking views, provided a serene and sophisticated ambiance that elevated the entire dining experience. Nautika offers not just a meal, but a memorable journey for the senses. We were truly privileged to have dined here, and it comes with our highest recommendation….
Great atmosphere and service from the team. Food was delicious and the views from the terrace awesome. Would highly recommend Nautika if you are in Dubrovnik and looking for a special meal
We had a great dinner on our last night in Dubrovnik! Ante was our server and he was excellent! We will recommend this restaurant and Ante specifically to any friends coming to Dubrovnik!
Simply an amazing view and dining experience. Not to be missed. Service impeccable, food and presentation at the very best, and a very idyllic atmosphere. Reservations are a must.

We enjoyed a beautiful night at Nautika on their second floor outdoor terrace with the St. Lawrence Fortress as our backdrop. We did a full tasting menu that was served with precision, creativity and care. Highly recommend Ant and Ivan as your servers! They brought us amazing wine pairings and were very personable. I also loved the pianist in their entryway! The ambiance is incredibly romantic. A must-try!

We went on our last night in Croatia. We had a front table on the balcony and the view was superb. The staff were attentive, friendly and efficient. We chose the a la carte menu. Food was fabulous although my husband’s main course of veal cheek was very small. It was a fabulous way to end our time in Croatia
Special place for a special evening; we celebrated our 20th wedding anniversary there recently. The food was exquisite and staff were very professional, even wore white gloves to serve us!

Outstanding service, ambiance, food. Lovely meringue-like amuse-bouche. We ordered the Adriatic Soup (such delicious broth!), Shrimps hot starter (delicious, 3 shrimp), Sea Bass Filet (also delish), and Veal Cheek (melt in your mouth scrumptious). We recommend booking in advance as they are definitely popular. We feel very fortunate to have gotten a table for 4 immediately (weekday evening) since there was a last minute cancellation. Also, they kindly made pasta with butter sauce for our toddler. Extensive wine and beverage selection. Impeccable, white-glove service. Amazing views. Truly a special dining experience!
Incredible View, Fantastic service and great food. I would recommend the tasting menu with their local wine pairing. Ask for an outdoor table
Food, service and views all absolutely outstanding. We have an absolutely fabulous evening celebrating our anniversary. We will definitely be back.

Just a beautiful restaurant overlooking the waters. The waiters were wonderful and playful with us. The menu is inventive and had plenty of choices for all palates including vegetarians. The extensive wine list is a must!

What can I say? This was one of the best meals I’ve ever had the pleasure to enjoy! From the minute we arrived at reception until the minute we left Nautica this was a 5 star experience. Henry our waiter and the sommelier were outstanding. The food was exceptional and the view and atmosphere were outstanding. Thank you for a truly memorable evening!

If you're looking for a divine and delightful evening for fine dining, this is the place.
The quality of the food is worth the expense. 
You will experience pleasant and warm hospitality and a memorable evening!
We had a wonderful meal with gorgeous views. Antonio was a fantastic server! Highly recommend if you are looking for a nice dinner overlooking the sea.

The best fine dining in Dubrovnik! Service was impeccable and the food even better. We had the Shrimp starter, i ordered the Veal cheek.. didn’t even need a knife for it! And my girlfriend ordered the sea bass, she said it was a 10/10. Thomislav was a fantastic server as well
Amazing tasting menu...food was creative and delicious. Henry was attentive, informative and fun as he took very good care of us.

From the moment you walk in from the moment you leave, it is top notch. Everyone provides amazing experience. Our server Antonio gave us a special experience. We also had the best food I’ve ever had. Not only during all my time traveling, but even in my home country. I’ll be dreaming of the sea bass. And cocktail presentations are out of this world. Don’t save this restaurant for the last day like we did. Go go go.
MUST TRY THE BASS! Everything is fabulous - Antonio P Was truly so sweet and the best experience we’ve had. If u have not been here and traveled To Old town Dubrovnik I feel bad for you

Fantastic experience 
We always make time to visit Tomas and his team when in Dubrovnik.
Welcome, food, wine, staff, location all fabulous.
Very very special place.
See you all again
And thank you for making the evening so special for our anniversary celebration.

We have been to multiple Michelin Star restaurants and this was better than most. The service, the food and the ambiance were outstanding. Book early to get a table on the front with views of the old town walls..you will not be disappointed!!
Wonderful place. The staff is very kind. Also they have live music with an awsome pianist. Food and the wine are amazing. The view from the terrace is outstanding.

Had the most amazing dinner at Nautika Restaurant tonight in Dubrovnik in Old Town. We sat in the upper terrace overlooking the fort and enjoyed the wonderful view. We had an exceptional dining experience where each course progressively got better. Hrvjoe was the best waiter and truly enhanced our dining experience. He was so knowledgeable and made great recommendations. I will look forward to eating here when we come back to Dubrovnik.
Tomislav was an Amazing man and helped us through the process of the night. The food, service and the atmosphere was beautiful.
Beautiful, food was unbelievable and the serve was perfect, fun and friendly. The view on the terrace was breathtaking

We chose this restaurant for the rating and view. Making early enough reservations was key for us as it books up. We had our seating at 6:30 and had the table for 3 hrs. Our sommelier was fantastic with the wine choices. We enjoyed 2 lively bottles of red and one oaky white. Fish was cooked to perfection.

Amazing food with the best service! The food was delightful and our server Antonio was even better! He explained all dishes beautifully as well as answered our questions on Dubrovnik and Croatia happily!

This restaurant is very over rated in our opinion. The views are spectacular but the food not so much. Service was terrible and we felt like our waiter did not like Americans and he was actually rude from the get go. It was my birthday and there was no acknowledgement even though they knew.
