Our food was not good and the waiter never came back to check on us or see how the food was. My husband told him he wanted a glass of wine with dinner but he never came back to see what he wanted so it didn't happen. Maybe this was only bad because of the waiter we had but a very disappointing experience.
Great dining experience with a wonderful view of the wall and fort on the sea. Delicious flavors with beautiful presentation and friendly service.
Genuinely outstanding food, service, and ambience. Henry was so kind, attentive and even educational with the wine and menu options. I’d come back to Dubrovnik just to go here.

The most wonderful location on the outside patio overlooking the Adriatic Sea and the fort and walls of Dubrovnik. The staff were exceptional and very professional yet fun. We did one of the tasting menus with wine pairing and it was out of this world!! This is a must do when in Dubrovnik!! Did not disappoint!!!

We had a wonderful meal at Nautika, everything was perfect - the atmosphere was incredible, we were sat on the balcony overlooking the water which was very relaxing. 

Our server, Hrvoje, was lovely - very knowledgeable about all of the food and able to provide recommendations for us. 

 I am gluten free and the restaurant provided gluten-free bread for me, as well as all of the desserts being GF which was a nice surprise as this doesn’t often happen!
Incredible food and highly attentive service in a beautiful setting, overlooking the ocean and historic walls. Very expensive, but highly recommend!
Amazing experience with the staff. Very attentive. Allowed us to share wines with neighboring tables. Excellent tasting menu. Please don’t miss out when you are here next.

The food was fabulous, the views breathtaking for a sunset dinner in Dubrovnik. The tuna tartare, shrimp risotto and lobster tail were among the best we’ve had. The sour cherry dessert was divine. With a Croatian white wine, it was the perfect meal. The wait staff was outstanding and the experience stunning. Ask for second-tier seats and cherish every moment, and every bite.

An amazing dinner at Nautika. My second time and it did not disappoint! I came with my Mum and the food was lovely and we had the best table with a gorgeous view. Our waiter Henry was very attentive, knowledgeable and gave great service for the evening. Definitely recommend!
Great food, amazing atmosphere, wonderful location, and absolutely outstanding service. More than highly recommended! A perfect dinner experience!
We had Mario for our dinner, he made our experience so joyful and once in a lifetime! He went above and beyond to make my mom and my night so wonderful. Can’t wait to come back!!!
What a beautiful experience! this is fine dining with white glove service. The food, the drinks, service and the music was amazing!
Great food and amazing view of Dubrovnik’s old fort! The local tuna and selection of olive oil were highlights. This was the fanciest restaurant we tried while in Croatia but it was well worth it.

Honestly from start to finish, the whole experience was exceptional. We showed up on an evening with no reservation and you were able to accommodate us.

All the waiting staff were very knowledgeable, attentive and warm towards us.

We both ordered the Bokar tasting menu. To have each course served and explained by the waiting staff added to the experience. We would recommend the Bokar tasting menu, the flavours, textures, and colours were exquisite!!

The view from our table was overlooking Fort Boker. This was incredible as the sun was setting.

You made our penultimate night of our Honeymoon in Dubrovnik very special.

Thank you very much ❤️, We will be back in the not so distant future.

Heard great reviews. Went with my partner- were a Black and Asian couple. The only ethnic minorities in the whole restaurant. I could see everyone else getting great service. Our waiter ignored us (literally pushing past my hand when I raised it to get his attention after waiting for 25mins), then when he brought water he poured it all over my phone whilst looking me in my eyes and smirking. I got up to leave but another staff member seemed to realise what was happening and behaved apologetically, attentively & the other guy didn’t come back to our table. I could never recommend here to anyone.

Best spot in Dubrovnik! Absolutely amazing food, staff and the views😍. We had a lovely waitor, Henry, who was an absolute delight. Had the Trip seafood selection and scallops for starters. Lamb and Sea bass for mains. Every thing was epic. Best meal we’ve both ever had. Tender and well seasoned. A must visit!

This restaurant is absolutely incredible. We had a meal here and our server Antonio was so helpful and friendly. It is a must do if in Dubrovnik, the setting is amazing and the food is out of this world, the sommelier chose some great wine for us, the dinner was very expensive but for the service we received and the quality of the food I would say it was worth it! Our trip will be a great memory to reminisce on in years to come.
For a special night out - Marin, Hrvoje, and Ante were all incredible and kind. A must-go destination when you visit Dubrovnik!

Expectations disappointed.
The relationship between quality and price is totally disproportionate. 
Average restaurant but sold as starred. 

Not recommended for Italians.

Had a table booked for 6:30pm outside at one of the front tables which had an amazing view. The service was impeccable, especially our waiter Tomislav who talked through every dish with us. The drinks were great and the food delicious! Well worth a trip if you are going to Dubrovnik :)
We had a tasting menu and a lovely out door table on the terrace. Wines offered were fantastic and the service was excellent. Highly recommend this restaurant for a special meal.

This was fantastic. We did a tasting menu on the last night of our honeymoon and it was fantastic. 
Incredible food, incredible service. Antonio our family aired was great. 
What an experience. 
What a view, most romantic meal we’ve ever had.

We came here for the final night of our honeymoon. Our waiter Antonio pulled out all of the stops to ensure we had an amazing night on the front row of the terrace. 

The chef adapted the fish 5 course tasting menu to my dietary requirements (gluten intolerant). The service and food were exceptional and the setting was beautiful. 

Worth every penny for our special occasion.

Our waiter Antonio was fabulous! His expertise was evident in his impeccable selection of drinks and food, which perfectly complemented each course. The white-glove service he offered enhanced the overall experience, with cocktails prepared tableside adding a touch of elegance and personalization. Antonio's attentiveness and knowledge elevated the meal, making it a memorable and exquisite culinary journey. I highly recommend this restaurant. We had an unforgettable experience.

Great food, amazing service and a great view
Thanks to zan for serving us, we had the 5 Course Tasting menu with fish and meat.

My husband and I went for our wedding anniversary and it was truly a once in a lifetime dining experience. I made the reservations months in advance so we could sit in the first row right along the balcony and it was amazing. Food was wonderful and the service was even better! Definitely request in advance for the first row!
Antonio is the waiter who attended us, was too friendly and super attentive to what we need, the restaurant is beautiful with a spectacular view.
We had an amazing experience with our waiter antonio he was a great service and fun our food was amazing very happy with the restaurant service

Not sure what you have to do to get a front row table here. I nooked4 months in advance to celebrate my husbands birthday. Confirmed on the day as instructed and again asked for a good table as special occasion. However set right back bit ok on the terrace. Start casual dress code,we were smartly dressed bit people on the front row in sports shorts and trainers.
People smoking between courses and our waiter although good was clearly stretched, so long waits and left with anvempty glass for a good while. Whilst explaining the menu and drizzling olive oil as recommended but without asking, actually drizzled all over my husband's cutlery!

Yes the food was nice but on the whole the ambiance totally lacked.
Very disappointed as really wanted this night to be special. Very happy to pay for an expensive dinner but expect better and we certainly had much better in Dubrovnik at much less cost.
Sad, as beautiful setting and nice food.
Amazing food and service!A memory for life. Truly recommend visiting and trying the five course menu. A perfect mix of meat and seafood, so something for everyone.

My fiancé and I had an amazing dinner. So romantic (but not in a cheesy way). The food was delicious and the service is the best we’ve ever had. If you get Ante as your server, you’ll be in for an amazing night
We celebrated the Father’s Day here and had an amazing time. The food and the view are both amazing. In addition, our waiter Antonio is very attentive and friendly.

We had an amazing dinner at Nautika! Ivan was the best server we’ve ever had at any dining experience, he truly made our dinner 10 times better. Not only was the experience spectacular but the food was even better. And the view!! Nautika is a must visit if you are in Dubrovnik. And ask for Ivan!

The most impeccable restaurant you’ll visit in Dubrovnik..the food 10/10, the service 10/10, the view 10/10. Could not fault this experience.
Shoutout to Ante for making our night extra special.
amazing service, felt a great connection and presentation was incredible , understood everything I was eating, want to come back every night!

Amazing food, amazing service, extensive wine list and delightful views over the old town walls and sea. The number one spot - just don’t be surprised when the game devs appear for one week in April (sorry not sorry)
So happy I had my birthday dinner here. AMAZING views, AMAZING food, and the service was incredible! Dante went above and beyond as our server.

Incredible sunset dinner with amazing views and delicious food, our experience was topped off by the excellent service of Ante, who was informative, interesting and humorous. The whole experience was 11/10.
11/10 service
11/10 food
11/10 experience
11/10 views
An amazing dinner and a highlight of our trip.

Impeccable service in a beautiful terrace overlooking the old city (just outside the Pile Gate). However, we did not enjoy much of the food, and our 21:30 reservation made the view fairly unimportant given it was dark.

We had the Trio Seafood Delicacies, Scallops, Shrimp Risotto and Beef Cheek. All the dishes are presented beautifully but there were some major issues, especially for a restaurant at this price point. The Trio of Seafood was just very plain tasting in the end and not worth the time. The scallop appetizer was the highlight of the meal and definitely something we'd get again. The shrimp risotto was flavorful but the shrimp was peanut sized chopped up pieces of fish, and thus not becoming of a restaurant like this where we'd expect to get nice large shrimps in a dish like this not cut up pieces of shrimp. The worst part was the beef cheek which was so fatty that most of it was inedible and spit out back on to the plate. Upon seeing this, without our complaining at all, they did take that dish off the check. Again, no issues with the service which was great, but too much of the food was a miss and we wouldn't try it again.
We were served by Ante (hope I spell the name correctly), what a unique experience it was! Dishes were tasty and service was top!
Fine dining at its best. We had the 5 course which was a great experience, out waiter Hendri was the best… would recommend any time.. Regards Stoffel

This restaurant was spectacular in many aspects. I do not think that you could find a better view in the city from the rear terrace. The food was delicious, every course. Our waiter, Henry, was attentive and made excellent recommendations. What a pleasant evening after a long day of hot sight seeing!

We came for dinner and it was absolutely amazing! Ante gave us 10/10 service with perfect recommendations and we would definitely come back!!! This is a must if you are visiting Dubrovnik. We will be back for sure.
My husband and I had a lovely time during our dinner here and Ante was an absolute wonderful host. We enjoyed visiting with him and learning more about Croatia.

Antonio was lovely! 
We had the best view. Thank you for the food and window selections. 
We will for sure be returning when we come back to Croatia!

We had the most amazing meal at Nautika restaurant. We chose the taster menu. Every course was incredible. The waiters were friendly, knowledgeable and couldn’t do enough for us. Our waiter (Henry) was fantastic. The food was sublime. We would definitely recommend. Book early to get a table and even earlier if you want a table with a view over the most spectacular sunset in Dubrovnik

We dined here on our last night in Dubrovnik, and it was easily one of the best dining experiences I've ever had. Interestingly, we met a couple in Korčula who insisted we visit Nautika Restaurant, and we were thrilled to already have reservations. The service was outstanding; though I can't recall our waiter's name, he was exceptional. We particularly enjoyed the olive oil tasting as part of the meal, so much so that we bought some of the oil before leaving Dubrovnik. From the amuse-bouche to the freshly made drinks at the table, every detail contributed to a dreamy dinner. The food was to die for, and the view made it all the more unforgettable

We ate our way through Croatia and Italy for 2 weeks and ate at a number of Michelin Guide and Michelin Star restaurants. This was our favorite dining experience. We had a front row table for two on the terrace. The view, service, wine list, and food were truly impeccable. Highly recommend.

Excellent service and food with a stunning view and atmosphere! One of the highlights from our trip to Dubrovnik. An extra special mention to our server Ante, who was attentive and made our experience wonderful!

Spectacular in every area. Firstly the venue was voted, and absolutely is the most romantic setting in the world, just beautiful. It's just the start, we were introduced to Ante our host who took service to another level. His knowledge and table style was exceptional, thank you Ante. The food was exquisite with flavours bursting on every dish. If you go to Dubrovnik then treat yourself to an evening that will stay with you for ever. Thank you team Nautika. Gary And Jenny (40th Anniversary).
Wonderful ambiance and staff. The food was amazing and would recommend. The view is fabulous and what better way to enjoy Dubrovnik!

Another great dinner at Nautika. Our waiter, Antonio, was wonderful. And Ivan made a special appearance to help us with a wine choice. 
The food is good, but the service makes Nautika a special place and a truly memorable experience. One of our favorite restaurants in all of Europe.
Very good service by Ante. Fantastic food and really good vegetarian options. Nice view and beautiful place. I can really recommend this place!

You deserve all the fame you have! The richness of detail, the professionalism of the waiters, the distinction of the master, the quality of the ingredients, the variety of dishes and the size of the wine chart, are worthy and compatible with the location and view. Undoubtedly, one of the highlights of the trip. Reservation of the table, in the top and in the first row, only even months in advance!

The ambience was fantastic, the entire staff was very accommodating and knowledgeable about all aspects of the meal with an emphasis on the local fare.
We had a fond appreciation for our entire table staff and specifically Ante. He was very knowledgeable and confident with his choices and a very helpful guiding hand and particularly with his local knowledge of the entire area.
Bravo to the entire team and singularly to Ante. SMM
This was just an amazing evening. The table, the view, the food, the wine, the ambience and last but not least Henry our waiter. It’s definetly the best restaurang in Dubrovnik. We will be back!

My meat dish came with a side of someone's hair strand. Rather than making a new dish, they took it to the back, removed the strand and brought back the same dish! Insanity at its best - I wouldnt take it if it was free!

The scenery was absolutely stunning, the waiter and other staff were extremely attentive. (Henry) was absolutely a charm. I would highly recommend the position on the terrace. 
The ambience changes as the sun goes down and the night lights against the fortress make a Stunning view.

The food was resented as you would expect in any classy restaurant.
Excellent food and service. Tasting menu plus wine pairing. Beef carpaccio was especially good. Thank you so much, Antonio!

OK, so how good is Nautika? Here’s my take: this restaurant is a classic, elegant, Old World kind of place. We had a lovely dinner, and its an absolutely fantastic setting overlooking the sea and one of the Old Town forts. Service is literally white gloved, and the wine “list” weights about 40 kg/20 lbs, more like an encyclopedia (very interesting reading about the wine regions of Croatia). The food is very good, but if you are looking for cutting edge/trendy, look elsewhere. It’s very expensive. We enjoyed our meals, nothing wrong at all….service emphasizes presentation and everything is served with a flourish (or two). Compared to other Michelin starred restaurants I’ve been to…feels like a place comfortable in their high place/plateau….doesn’t feel the need to stretch. So enjoy it for what it is, and book that outside table early!

The place is elegant, the location splendid, the food tasty...
If the portions were twice the size, we could consider them small. Fortunately they serve you quite a lot of bread and oil, but after more than €100 per person, without wine or dessert and sharing a starter... you would have to look for a nearby pizzeria.
Of course they do not have fans on the terrace (they are not "cool") so the heat is insufferable.
Never again!

As part of the industry I must say that there is absolutely no match between quality and price. We decided on the tasting route, no-sense portions (from the very small first, to the last too abundant or dishes served in tasting that should be followed à la carte).
Medium-low quality, no balance of flavors not to mention certain preparations. Tiring and out of place also the selection of oils in every course, where the taste went to cover every single dish. 
I am sorry but I find myself in total disagreement with the Michelin Guide where it marks the restaurant as one of the best in the city. 
The service not too attentive and present, except for Antonio very nice and skilled seller. More than positive note for desserts.

BEautiful location. Though they were at first reluctant to give us an outside table though one was available. they did in the end
The food was good, and the service was eventually good but too many waiters just standing around a lot of the time

We had an amazing dinner at Nautika! We had a second row table as I booked too late, so book the first row early! Everyone in our party enjoyed the food, service and ambiance! Definitely a special restaurant in a special City!

Antonio was fantastic! The food, the WINE, the service…everything was spectacular. My colleague and I were here for a site visit for a client and can’t wait to bring the group back here in April 2025 (only if Antonio is here though :) )
Lovely view, wonderful service and amazing food! We last ate here 20 years ago and the more things change the more they stay the same. Still an awesome restaurant!!

Antonio was amazing for our amazing anniversary meal with my girlfriend and our first time on holiday, made us feel welcome and made sure we were more than satisfied, very friendly and polite, cannot recommend Nautika enough, thanks again to Antonio and the team for making our evening even more special!

We had a fantastic dinner - food, wine and service, especially from our waiter Antonio made it a night to remember. The highlights were the tuna tartare, the truffle tortellini and the sea bass. Cannot recommend enough.

This dinner was the highlight of our vacation in Dubrovnik. The most amazing view of the Adriatic Sea, scenic rocks and medieval walls of the old town Dubrovnik coupled with the most delicious and imaginative local cuisine. Beautiful people around and soft piano music in the background, I didn’t want to leave. Antonio was our waiter and he took such good care of us with many complimentary dishes - such friendly elegant service. Highly recommended. Seabass is a must have. Icing on the cake - beautifully done yummy drinks

Wonderful restaurant for a special evening in Dubrovnik. We got a table outside (with a reservation). We loved the food and service (Antonio was very helpful and nice). The view of the sea and the wall of the old town is absolutely stunning.

Stunning views and incredible service. Fine dining at its best! My husband and I were well taken care of throughout our dining experience. It is amazing to be able to spend about 3 hours enjoying the views, and working our way through appetizers, meals, wine, and dessert without ever feeling rushed. The quality of the food was amazing and one of the best meals we have ever had. A must visit in Dubrovnik!

Considering the my previous experiences in the Michelin restaurants, This restaurant is definitely overrated. I don’t understand how it could take place in the Michelin guide, the sauce of the meats were salty, the lamb lost its taste because it had been cooked too long. We ordered 1 hot starter and one main course per person and we paid €450 for three people with a bottle of wine. By the way the service was perfect, All staff were very friendly and polite, additionally the atmosphere was amazing

One of the best restaurants I have ever been to.

The food was absolutely exquisite from start to finish. We had the 7 course taster menu. Worth every penny. A particular highlight was the tuna, the ox cheeks and the cuttlefish, but it was all good. A nice feature was they brought round a different type of olive oil with each savoury course - a lovely touch!

The wine menu is extremely extensive (about 35 pages long). We had one of the best wines I have ever had, as recommended by the sommelier. 

The staff were incredible and extremely attentive. We mentioned that we wanted to try some local spirits and they served them to us on the house. A lovely and thoughtful touch. 

I definitely recommend booking in advance and requesting the front line on the terrace. You do not want to be in their front garden as it’s very touristy there. 

They have a lovely piano reception as you walk in. The pianist even sang a few songs throughout the night which was lovely.

Looking for a bit of luxury in the heart of the old town? Look no further

Very hard to find anything wrong with this restaurant. Superb service, food and atmosphere. Surprised it doesnt have a star. Better than many starred restaurants we’ve been to. Special shout out the Hvorje who exemplifies how a waiter should be. Book early if you want a table here.

For sure the best restaurant in the whole country! 
This place is something special. It’s an experience you can’t miss if you stay in Dubrovnik.
Mario and Antonio have been our main waiters in this evening and they are amazing. I’m sure wherever you came from they speak your language.
Unbelievable how professional and friendly they were. The whole team made an atmosphere we will never forget.
The food is Michelin level just trust the recommendations of your waiter!

It was the best experience I've had in the city in the week I've been staying! The atmosphere, the location, the view and, above all, the loving and special service! I'd go back a thousand times! Thank you Mario and Antonio !

Nautika is an incredible setting for an even more incredible meal. Just to the side of the hustle and bustle you feel miles away. Part of what lifts you from the mayhem is the impeccable service of the restaurant. Ante was very skilled waiter and I might say director of courses as he guided us through choosing a medley of dishes (not the tasting menu). They suited us perfectly. Highlights included beef carpaccio, shrimp bisque, exquisite foie gras, veal cheek my husband is still talking about and scallops that could not have been prepared more perfectly. The whole wait staff team flows effortlessly. But Ante with his wit and incredible personality blew us away. It was a night to remember.

From when your first contact with the matra’de - waiters….. excellent!!! Cocktails were beautiful & each dish was a burst of loveliness. A must experience 👍🏼. 
No mater what? It won’t let you down.

My wife and I had a wonderful 5-course dinner. Ante is so humorous and his service is very professional and wonderful. A great night here today and so lucky to get a table, which needs to be reserved early!

DO NOT MISS. Yes, it's expensive - it has a Michelin star - but the food was fantastic, the setting on the water near the old city walls was amazing, and the service was perfect. Will never forget this meal.

Where do I start? Despite showing booked online all week, the staff was able to accommodate us on our anniversary night for an incredible dinner experience where we were treated as VIP from the moment we stepped in, to the moment we left. We never felt rushed and had a table with amazing view available to us for 3 hours. Special thanks to our server Hrvoje for treating us like gold! 

Now onto the meal - food and drinks were incredible - I had (I believe) a Pina Azul which was finalized right at our table. We had a Tuna Tartare for appetizer with lots of mini artisan breads that were coming out of the oven frequently for refills… then for dinner we ordered the Veal, the Lamb and Sea Bass dishes and dessert we had the chocolate and my daughter had the Sour Cherry. 

I am so happy for the incredible night we have and the memories we created at Nautika! It will be hard for us to top this anniversary dinner - there is no doubt about it!
My husband brought me to this restaurant during a trip to Dubrovnik for my 50th birthday. The food and experience was out of this world. An amazing place to celebrate my milestone birthday.

One of the best restaurants I have ever been to. The food was magnificent. The service was impeccable. It was not cheap, but the food was so good. Who cared? II asked the waiter for a recommendation and he gave me that typically I have not enjoyed at other places. Butu I took the recommendation and they delivered. It was better than I hoped. First rate across the board
great food great view great dessert great service would come again and recommend family and friends to visit soon thankyou so much
Ivan and Mario are very helpful and nice. Service they provided was extraordinary! Food was really delicious and with reasonable price with this view.

Where do I even start with this restaurant? We booked the entrance terrace 1st row, however on the day it was pouring down! We arrived and were informed by the friendly and welcoming staff that they could accommodate us on the main terrace instead. What a table! We were under the awning and had a beautiful view! We had a 7 course taster menu with paired wines and every course without exception was spectacular. The veal cheeks were hands down the best plate of food I have ever eaten. Beautifully paired wine, superb service, if you’re debating booking don’t… just do it!

We had dinner here this evening, and what a special night from start to finish. We initially thought we'd be paying for the view, but the food was top class and the service beyond exceptional. Our whole team of waitors/sommelier were amazing, so friendly and personable. We did the 7 course tasting menu with paired wines that were faultless. Each course was a culinary treat and complemented by the wine perfectly. The pianist made for a lovely atmosphere, and the views were stunning. It's definitely a treat and though expensive, well worth the money. Highly recommend for a special evening.

Mario was a really nice guy and the staff were friendly and kind. Thank you for a wonderful time😊♥️
I'd love to come again
Dubrovnik is the best, the best city
I'm glad I made the reservation a month in advance
The terrace seats were great and well thought out, even when it rained
The food and view from the restaurant were amazing, location was also perfect and our staff Mario was a great guy!! 100% recommend you to go.

The place oozes perfect service and if you sit on the top terrace, there is no better setting. 
Wines by the glass go perfectly with the food, and the wine expertise of the waiters is high. You feel seen all the time, and everyone takes good care of you. 
For me, the food drags me down a bit. It lacks something in terms of flavour, although visually it looks good. Some dishes taste better and more than others. But those desserts were an amazing experience! I didn't get to try out all the dishes, so here I can go back.
Very good service and good. Highly recommend this! Appreciate our best server gentleman Ante! Thanks for this! Love it and will come again!
We had a great time here at Nautika. The view was amazing. The food was so delicious, and the people here were very friendly and welcoming. Our server Ante helped us with taking great photos.

One of the best meals I have ever had across Europe! I went solo and the restaurant was kind enough to accommodate a last minute reservation. My server Antonio provided excellent recommendations that I barely even saw the menu, and everything was just perfect. I tried the shrimps for my appetizer and the fish for my main, and the chocolate hazelnut dessert. Everything tasted so spectacular and different than anything else I ever had. It was a great mix of salty, savory and sweet. I would come back here even just for the dessert! Oh and you can’t miss out on the view
Nice place but too expensive. For being in that area it has very high prices. I absolutely do not recommend for families

My friends and I had the most lovely dinner at Nautika with our waiter Ante. He made our evening so special and all of the dishes melted in your mouth. The service was unmatched - anyone coming to Dubrovnik looking for a nice dinner should definitely come to Nautika.

Nautika’s initial draw is its unmatched view of the ocean. However, we stayed for much more. Opting for the 5 course tasting menu and creative cocktails, we stayed here for over three hours enjoying food and laughter. Each course was crafted meticulously, only minor critiques to note. The cocktails were presented beautifully, we couldn’t recommend enough. The service here is top notch, and Mario was our favorite. We highly recommend Nautika for a special occasion, you will not be disappointed.
We had Mario as our server and he was delightful! Food was amazing and couldn’t recommend this restaurant enough to anyone visiting!
We had the perfect dinner, amazing food and location. I proposed to my now fiance here and Mario was the dream waiter, subtly filming the special moment. Give that man a raise

Great food and even better service! We enjoyed our dinner with relaxing music and an even better view. We did the tasting menu and each course was better than the last. Thanks for a great experience with Ante as our waiter!

Excellent service and setting. Very engaging and knowledgeable. 👌
Vegetarians catered for with a separate menu. 10/10 recommend.

Lovely venue for an evening of fine dining luxury. We hadn’t booked, (probably best to book). Were taken upstairs to a lovely covered roof terrace with sea snd rooftop views. Not cheap, but a great experience that we won’t forget. 
Lovely staff that tell you all about the food and even a special bag to take the remains of your wine.

Beautiful place with good food. A spectacular view on the Fort. Thanks to our waiter Mario to propose us to sit at the best table of the restaurant to finish our dinner. We recommend strongly for a romantic dinner on the terrace. Really good service of all the waiters.

We came here at 630pm and it was the perfect time, we got sunlight, sunset, and night. Service was 10/10. Mario was our waiter and he went above and beyond to make sure we were happy. Tasting menus were absolutely amazing, beef cheek and shrimp was the best. Mario even gave us blankets when it got cold and complimentary drinks at the end of our dinner. Drinks were an awesome experience and a show. Old fashion and martini is a must

This highly rated restaurant did not disappoint in any way. The service was impeccable. Servers seem to possess psychic abilities. They attended to our every need and want before we could voice them. Everything about this restaurant speaks high end, minus any exhibition of snooty attitude.
Every bite of every item ordered provided a taste sensation. While I tipped more than 20%, I have felt guilty ever since for not tipping more as the meal, service and view from our table was the best we've experienced.

I booked a table at Nautica in February as a Valentines present for my wife, on our planned trip to Croatia in May. A special meal as a highlight of our trip.
The setting is nothing less than stunning, we had a table in prime position looking out on the sea and at the old city walls of Dubrovnik. A flock of swifts swooping across our view as we ate.
The service was exceptional, just the right balance of helpful but not intrusive with a touch of gentle humor.
We had a 5 course taster menu, largely fish based. The cooking was of a very high standard, one dish in particular was superb and was my favorite dish of our whole trip.
If you are looking for something special - here it is!
This restaurant is beautiful, the food was amazing and the service was 5 stars. Antonio made the night extremely special for us, will definitely be back again!
Surreal night with a beautiful view and stunning food. And the most accommodating service provided by Antonio. Would definitely come again. 10/10
It was great. Best Tuna Fillet I’ve ever had. Thank you to Antonio for being very accommodating, and going over the top for me and my girls:)

This spot is absolutely amazing! The views are gorgeous and the whole atmosphere is so peaceful. I highly recommend. The waiters, specifically Antonia, were all so sweet and helped provide great recommendations!

Beautiful and romantic location with great view on the little bay and castle. The food is excellent and the wine list is absolutly great with a huge and excellent selection of Croation and international wines. The best however was our waiter Antonio. He was extremely charming and attentive and gave us many insights into Croatian kitchen, olive oil and culture. It was our last evening in Croatia and he made it to a highliht. 
We highly recommend this restaurant - and reserve well advance to get a front seat.
Gorgeous views and an incredible meal. The staff was so kind and helpful. Ante was our server and he was top notch. Amazing experience, 10/10!
Absolutely breathtaking view , service was impeccable and food was delicious . Highly recommend , make reservations in advance.

Wonderful experience at this restaurant in Dubrovnik! We were served good cocktails by elegant waiters while we waited for a table, and the skilled pianist ensured a very good atmosphere by taking requests straight away. We were 3 couples, and got a table all to ourselves out on the terrace with a superstructure on the 2nd floor, with a fantastic view of the sea and the light show at Fort Lovrijenac, and with heat lamps and blankets as the sun disappeared. Definitely recommend sitting outside when the weather permits!

Ordered a 5-course menu with a customized wine package. The food was a bit variable, from fantastically good dishes (prawns, veal and chocolate dessert) to more disappointing and slightly tasteless fish dishes and a slightly too fancy fish soup. The wine package, on the other hand, was absolutely brilliant, and the waiters' knowledge of both food, drink and Dubrovnik's history, combined with their wonderful mood, made the whole stay a brilliant experience well worth the steep price. I looked at the clock when we were about to leave, and realized that we had stayed well into overtime, so thank you to those of you who actually stayed so that we could enjoy the evening!

This restaurant is located in a beautiful, romantic location. The operation and service are very good. We sat outside on the terrace with music from a pianist. The menu offers sufficient choice and the wine list is very extensive. We found the food good but less refined than we expected. Despite the location and service, in our opinion the bill was too high.

One of the best views of the fort in Dubrovnik. The food was great and service was impeccable! Ante was our server and he did a wonderful job making us feel as if we were at home! A lovely and very romantic restaurant. Would recommend for couples in particular!

We came here for my partners birthday as a treat, it was my first fine dining experience and it was impeccable. The service from the waiter and sommelier was outstanding, they were so friendly and attentive. The food was the best we both have ever eaten, I couldn’t recommend this place enough definitely a must go when in Dubrovnik.

If the food and the stunning view wasn’t enough to give Nautika a 5/5, Antonio’s service along with everyone else on the team was first class. When we come back to Drubovnik, I will definitely be coming back

We were here for a special birthday. We got a seating right by the water around 6.15. Our dining experience went through almost 9 pm - we mostly selected from the vegetarian menus plus some other items.
The sommelier recommended a Croatian Babic wine that was one of the best old wine bottles that we’ve had.
The service from Hrvoja and team was simply spectacular.

This restaurant exceeded expectations. Every course was incredible and unique. The beetroot appetizer was my favorite. Did not want it to end. This is very high end service restaurant similar to US. Really enjoyed it.

Beautiful view, very friendly service staff,
unfortunately the food does not match the price-performance ratio!!!

Absolutely excellent food and amazing views. Ante was amazing, he was very welcoming and kept engaging with us throughout the night. We couldn’t have asked for better service. Thank you again for a lovely experience.

We booked this for our final night of a short break and couldn't have asked for more. The terrace overlooks the 'Red Keep' so its in a stunning location. The service was impeccable - attentive, and informative but at the same time engaging which made the whole experience wonderful. Of course the food was spectacular - delicious and beautifully presented - a true gourmet experience!

Wow! This was a fantastic experience. The views over the fort were exceptional along with the food and service! Also a huge selection of wines available. We ate on the terrace and blankets and heat lamps were provided to keep you warm.

From the greeting to farewell, impeccable service. Despite torrential rain (which provided unusual entertainment in fact), we were served on the terrace overlooking the bay, cosy with heaters and blankets. The food was beautifully presented and utterly delicious. Had many a Michelin meal, but this was memorable not just for the (expected - but nevertheless highly appreciated) excellent food but on this occasion for the informed introduction to Croatian wine by Ante. As fellow travellers along the WSET pathway we were delighted to have him guide our wine choices. The wine list is incredible (huge book!) and though our budget clipped our wings, there is in fact an unusually large selection of interesting wines by the glass - both Croatian and other European/international.. but no need to go beyond the Croatian pages! We particularly recommend the red dessert wine to accompany the yummy chocolate/walnut pudding.

Great experience! The servers are super friendly! The dishes are delicious! The experience on the terrace on the edge of the Adriatic Sea, under the full moon, facing the ramparts of Dubrovnik, was magical!

We had an amazing experience at this restaurant. Ante was an amazing and attentive server, and brought over complimentary dessert. The staff was incredibly helpful in selecting wine and the perfect food pairing. It was truly a spectacular dining experience. Would definitely recommend!
Ante was such an amazing server. He gave us such an incredible experience. The wine was fabulous and food was exquisite. I would cone back here!

The place is magnificent, seated on a terrace facing the sea, the rocks and fortifications.
The service is top notch, with welcome humor. The wine list is very comprehensive, we choose by the glass and the recommendations are perfect.
In terms of starters and main courses, it is indeed very good, without a false note, but for the price, we expected, for this trio of the sea (starter), this lamb or this lobster to be more complex, more technical, for a star and the associated prices.
The homemade breads are very average, the oils excellent.
The desserts leave the same impression. Good but a bit below in technique and taste as expected from a place of this standing

Best restaurant in the city people who go don't regret it. There is a huge quality difference you can see.
Also there is a quite view so you can enjoy your meal with a nice city look

On occasion, unfortunately on rare occasion, the location, service and ambience of a restaurant transcends being described as a meal. Nautika is such restaurant.
Walking past the piano player to reach the enchanting terrace overlooking the small inlet at the north of Dubrovnik's walls, it's hard to imagine a better place to relax and be spend quality time with the family.
To describe Ivan and Darko as waiters would be disservice. They looked after us in such a natural and enjoyable manner without ever feeling over bearing. It was more like going to a friend's home. 
The food was excellent, everything fresh and bursting with taste. We dined at Restaurant 360 the night before and loved it, but preferred Nautika because of location and staff.

My husband and I had such a wonderful evening at Nautika and want to thank the staff, especially Antonio and his brother Ivan, for making it so special. From the stunning view from our table, to every dish and wine that was recommended, we simply loved everything. We left laughing at the playful humor of the brothers and felt like we had made new friends. How often does that happen at an upscale restaurant? We hope to return someday soon! Thank you again!
An amazing experience! Loved every minute and the food was just beautiful. The service was lovely especially by our personal waiter Ante

We went to Nautika for my 30th birthday and it was an amazing experience. The view was great as we got a niece corner table from which we watched as the sun set on Dubrovnik. Our assigned waiter Hrvoje was friendly, attentive and knowledgeable, and served the amazing food and drinks with great introductions.
Hrvoje was amazing. Helpful and friendly.Food amazing. Views amazing. We Will definitely be back. Would reccomend the place.

The setting is superb, in the shadow of centuries old monuments: The Fort and the grand wall of the Old Town, which are beautifully illuminated at night. A talented pianist enhanced our dining experience. Each dish was artfully presented with care by white gloved servers. The amuse bouche was a delicious palate cleanser setting the stage for subsequent courses. I very much enjoyed the Dalmatian style lamb chops and trio of seafood appetizers. The complimentary pralines (chocolates) were fabulous. Gorgeous terrace—make reservations to guarantee a table there. A special meal at the best restaurant in Dubrovnik.
Antonio was a fantastic waiter and the food was great. Very attentive the whole time and he’s politely made the experience a once in a lifetime memory.
One of the best restaurants i have been on. Very good service, even it was outside, and a little bit windy(50-55 km/h)😀 big thx to our servant and sommelier for a magnificent night ❤️
The spot is very beautiful with scenic ocean views. Ante was a very good server, very professional and kind, he explained the dishes in detail and was very attentive towards us.
Nautika offers a spectacular view of the Old City,but also a wider area of amazingly beautiful landscapes,fantastic food. Especially, very good service by Ante

My partner and I came for dinner here on a whim. We asked the waitress whether there were any tables free with a great view and they confirmed that one was available that evening. My are we glad that we did that! The food here is incredible, we had the lamb and the steak and lots of delicious wine. The waiters were extremely kind and the service was fast. The star of the show is the pistachio desert which I cannot stop thinking about! Thank you for an excellent evening. We will be back!

The view is impeccable. The food is good, except the portions are small for this Michillien starred restaurant. Started with bread in award-winning balsamic vinegar or olive oil, followed by a seven-course meal while the sun was setting: octopus salad, lobster tail (tiny) salad, lobster (again tiny) soup, grilled scallop, lobster with pasta, dessert, and cheese.

Great for upscale dining with beautifully prepared food and an amazing view. We were most impressed with the staff and management and how they handled a difficult situation with part of the restaurant being booked with a large private party who became drunk and disruptive to the other diners. The staff went above and beyond to make it right!

A sensational evening. The 5-course tasting menu with tuna tartare, shrimp, fish soup and fish fillet was simply wonderful. The chocolate dessert was a brilliant finale. And the staff were top-notch, extremely attentive and absolutely competent. The wine list weighs an estimated 5 kg, and the location itself with a view of the sea is unique. Of course, that comes at a price, but it was worth every cent.
Absolutely amazing! The place is beautiful and staff are friendly and the food is delicious. I am definitely going back.

Memorable meal in a stunning setting. Friends joined my husband and I on the terrace at sunset. The experience was exceptional, a meal/experience I am unlikely to forget. The service was top notch. The sommelier was especially good, somehow making sense of our disparate palates and recommending a bottle of champagne and two bottles of wine which satisfied us all. Highly recommended.

The location is very atmospheric. My husband is gluten and dairy free and they had a couple of options he could have. The food was delicious but it was not the best thing we ate on holiday. It was however three times more expensive. Honestly I wouldn't recommend when there are so many brilliant other options in old town. I had broken my wrist the day before and so was stretching my arm (in a cast) and someone (maitre de?) came over and very unsympathetically made it clear I shouldn't be doing that and bringing down the mood with my visible injury.
Best experience ever! Best service, food, largest wine card, best sommeliers, breathtaking wiews, just perfect experience!

Could not recommend Nautika more highly. My husband and I went on our honeymoon, I recommend booking in advance and requesting a table near the water. The food was 10/10, service 10/10, everything was just incredible we were blown away.
A great 7 course a la carte dinner. Pairing each dish with different olive oils was a first for me and was a nice addition. An excellent meal in a beautiful city. Not cheap, but worth it!

This is an experience you cannot miss if you are in Dubrovnik with a partner and want a romantic evening. We did the tasting menu and it was unbelievable, but so was the service. The only regret is the night didn’t last longer.

This was an over the top experience. We went for our anniversary dinner and the attention to detail and service was outstanding. The meal is an expensive meal for sure, but for a special occasion, it is worth it. We booked 3 months in advance and got a seat outside near the railing. It was raining but we still had a great view under the awnings. For sure you need to book well in advance if you want a good seat.
An exceptional dinner, fabulous cooking skills, and a superb view… in short, a very, very good romantic dinner

An amazing restaurant in a gorgeous location, the food was stunning and the service was second to none! All the food was presented beautifully, tasted so fresh and delicious and came with faultless service. Would recommend this restaurant without hesitation!

It was an experience, the place, the food, the service, the atmosphere, everything was very refined. We chose it based on recommendation and to have a beautiful view from the balcony. The price is a little high, but it's worth the experience as a whole.

We considered ourselves lucky to get a table at this popular restaurant. Very attentive and personal service, Receptionist, Maître D’, Sommelier and our Waiter. Never intrusive, always present at the right time. The food was amazing, the selection of drinks, the wine list, everything is a perfect match.
Not to mention the view and the atmosphere.
We had a great evening, Thank You Nautika Team!
Seriously one of the best all around experiences of my life in travel restaurants! The food, The atmosphere, The service!!!

Beautiful setting - excellent service-
We had a table on the edge overlooking the wall and sea. I loved the choice of wines for the tasting menu and especially the individual local olive oils.

From the start we were made welcome and were shown to a table in a spectaclur setting. We were overlooking one the Games of Thrones coastal settings (I think it was Kings Landing). And the view was amazing.

The staff are friendly, engaging and utterly professional! They knew their dishes when describing them to us and even hinted at their favourites for us to order. This all went down very well.

We had amuse-bouches which were divine. One interesting fact came out: The Croations love and are passionate about their olive oil. We were able to sample four different oils with a selection of breads.

The food is what you would expect from a Michelin restaurant. The best ingredients, cooked to perfection and all very delicious. I wish I had more.

A fantastic experience. If you are in magical Dubrovnik, this is the cherry on the top!

We splurged on dinner and tried the seven course menu. Did not like the veal cheeks but everything else was just wonderful. We had a table by the wall on the terrace, overlooking the water. Wonderful evening and exceptional service. What a wonderful romantic evening while on holiday.

Stunning views over the bay and city walls. Upmarket vibe as soon as you enter the restaurant. Pianist tinkling the ivories made us smile - theme tune to GOT.
Mario our waiter very attentive and knowledgeable. Three excellent courses although the sea bass fish a little over salty for our liking. 
Sommelier came to discuss the dessert wine. Very professional. We even managed to bag a slice of birthday cake from a table celebrating nearby. Very generous, thank you.

Food was absolutely fabulous, one of the most amazing flavors. 
Croatian wine was spectacular, we tried Rieseling. 
I’m usually a German wine drinker but Croatian wine, stole my heart! 
Mario was amazing, the service, the kindness, great chat, smiles all around. What a gentleman. He was incredible! 
Also, the piano man was beautiful. 
This place is one of the best places I have ever been. 
We are from NY and NYC has nothing on Nautika 🤍
The location is beautiful and the food and service outstanding. Highly recommend. Go at sunset for a perfect setting

However, the moment you'll end up remembering over and over again will be if you get an Old Fashioned presented at your table by a bartender (I really wish I could remember his name). It's that special.

Too demanding waiter, he didn't even let us breathe. I reach the point of being attentive to intense. The food is nothing special, you can definitely eat somewhere else for much less and equal quality. The atmosphere and view were very good, but the attention of the staff and food were nothing special. I don't recommend this place.
Wonderful view, excellent service, and outstanding food. It was highly recommended and we can see why. We chose the seven course Tasting Menu and we loved it!

Nautika was absolutely amazing - the food was sublime, I had the shrimps to start, followed by the beef then the chocolate dessert. My husband had the lamb. The service was wonderful throughout the meal - the staff are very knowledgeable about the dishes they offer. The view is stunning at sunset. I highly recommend Nautika to all those who visit the beautiful Dubrovnik.

We had the 4 course with the wine pairing, outstanding. If you are looking for a 5 star dinner, this is for you. The service, food, wine as good as it gets all served up overlooking the old city and Adriatic. A dinner for a lifetime.

The most romantic restaurant ever!!! It was everything amazing! The staff was very helpful and explained all the dishes. The food was fabulous!! Me and my husband visited Nautika in our honeymoon in Croatia and it was the best experience ever! We did the 7 course tasting menu and we tried the lobster. It was delicious! I would definitely recommend!!!

Came here for my 40th birthday. Very well looked after. Beer in the lounge before dinner was a nice touch. Two small children who were really well looked after. Bringing children to dinner sometimes confuses other restaurants but they knew what they were doing here. Eldest (4) offered chicken and chips - finished the plate. Youngest (1) offered tomato pasta which was well received. We then got to relax with some Malvasia, fish and lamb. Perfect meal. Perfect view. Best meal ever. Thank you.
Amazing food, amazing service, especially Mario and Marco, the sommelier. I loved the atmosphere! Thank you for being so lovely!

It is difficult to beat the quality of the food and the treatment received!!! It has been a long time since we had so much fun in a restaurant.... Congratulations!!! The food 10, the service 10, the recommendations of our waiter 10. The professionalism of the staff and the quality of the dishes 10. In addition to the wonderful environment... To repeat as many times as we can return!!!
Everything incredible! Ambience, food, wine and service, impeccable. Worth every penny. Spectacular experience. We love it

This was a magical night. A group of friends just having a wonderful time, with the most amazing foods. Mario, was attentive, professional and made us feel like we were his only customers. His suggestions were spot on and he and Marco helped us pair the perfect wine with dinner. This is a must try! The view is spectacular as well! Ask for Mario, you won't be disappointed.

From the moment we stepped into Nautica Restaurant in Dubrovnik, we knew we were about to embark on a culinary journey like no other. Set against the historic backdrop of this UNESCO World Heritage city, Nautica offered us an exquisite dining experience that truly elevated our honeymoon.

The white-glove service was impeccable, striking the perfect balance between attentiveness and discretion. It's not every day that you encounter a team so dedicated to perfection. Our server, in particular, went above and beyond, not only ensuring our dining experience was flawless but also taking the time to capture multiple cherished photographs of us. This personal touch, combined with the expertise of multiple servers guiding and educating us on the array of delectable dishes and crafted cocktails, made us feel like royalty.

The food, as expected, was a symphony of flavors, each dish artfully presented and bursting with freshness and creativity. And while the price point may be on the higher side, every bite justified the expense. As they say, you get what you pay for, and at Nautica, we were served nothing short of excellence.

In a city renowned for its dining experiences, Nautica stands out not just for its outstanding cuisine, but for the passion and dedication of its staff. Our evening there wasn't just a meal; it was an event, an experience, a memory we will cherish forever.

For those contemplating a visit, our advice is simple: treat yourself. Whether it's a special occasion like ours or simply the desire for an unmatched dining experience, Nautica Restaurant in Dubrovnik is well worth the splurge. Here's to an evening of sheer perfection by the Adriatic! 🍷🍴🌊 Book a reservation as this is a Michelin guide restaurant and you won't be able to just walk-in as it's high demand and books up fast.

To be honest it was probably the best dinner we had this year. The food is great, but the service steals the show. The area is dreamy and the live music makes it perfect. 

Valentino our waiter was truly the best and we highly recommend his services. 

Don’t hesitate and don’t be filled by the flashy restaurants around - run to this place
What an experience!! Food was beyond expectations. Service as you would expect was impeccable!! Utterly stunning and magical location.
Food is amazing and staff is very friendly and polite. I had such a great time, ambiance is so relaxing and beautiful. Thank you to Mario and Valentino for the perfect service, very much appreciated!

This is one of the most incredible restaurants I’ve ever been, from the breathtaking views to the lovely service! It was an absolute pleasure from beginning to end. Mario made us feel extra special and guided us through our experience. Definitely a must when you come to dubrovnik

Not (at least) yet Michelin Star restaurant, but for us it looked like they were overtrying to get the star. This was seen in the service - first manager greets and introduces the waitor, then they had separate serves for carrying the food, you were also guided for the toilettes. For us this took a bit away from the experience as the restaurant felt too stiff and conservative. So if you want a relaxed dinner, I would recommend some other place, but if you are fine with upper class style of place then recommended to try this place. In the end restaurant has a unique views for the sea and good food.

Nautika clearly care about providing an excellent customer experience - the views, the greeting as you come through the doors, the 30 page wine book you’re handed on its own stool. However the experience feels a little ‘try too hard’ rather than naturally good customer service. We had the tasting menu with wine pairing and the food was good but admittedly, we’ve had better in Dubrovnik for the price. A nice experience but somehow I feel the price-quality ratio is off balance here.

I have to be honest in these reviews even though establishment wouldn’t agree with me. 5 of us dined in one of the most romantic restaurants in world. The restaurant’s romantic atmosphere has drawn celebrity couples including Hollywood royalty (Goldie Hawn and Kurt Russell) and actual royalty (Prince and Princess Akishino of Japan and the king and queen of Norway). The day before we were there Magic Johnson dined with them. First thing first if truly want to enjoy the romantic atmosphere then only dine at the table outside on the first floor by the wall. We dined at 3rd floor outside and we didn’t feel that romantic atmosphere.

Second is the food part. We were so excited to be able to make a reservation at this place but at the end we overhyped ourselves and we left with a disappointment. Trust the other reviewers who say; “Incredibly overpriced, tiny portions, left extremely hungry.” We did a la carte but that’s the wrong way to go. You have to do the 5 course to fill your stomach. We ordered different things such as sea bass, lamb, and few other main dishes. We tried each other foods and to be honest we didn’t feel like this was a Michelin star meal. Portions were small because their menu is planned as a 5 course meal. When I say this and we are not kidding but the best tasting food here was the fresh bread and the dessert plate they offered (complimentary). I think that sums up the food review pretty well.

If you ever want to dine at this place make sure to dine like celebrities and sit on the table by the wall/water. Also do the 5 course meal. Otherwise you are not truly getting that experience.

We visited NAUTIKA on the last evening of our stay on the 9th August as part of our 20th wedding anniversary celebrations. I was unable to book a table on the front terrace for the actual day(2nd August) even when booking in January of this year! So please do not leave booking to the last minute as you're most likely be disappointed. Having not being been able to book the 2nd, this was probably a blessing in disguise as our experience here just rounded off our perfect stay in Croatia(we were staying at the Kompass Hotel in Lapad).

So to our Experience(not just a meal) on their 6:30pm sunset sitting.
From standing outside this fabulous building before entering which was once a former Sailors school, to our sad departure we had an absolutely wonderful time. 
Tomaslav & his team have the perfect balance of being professional & friendly in equal measures.
On being met at the entrance & walked up the red carpeted steps into the elegant lounge area we were certainly made to feel very 'special'.
We were then shown to our table(30) WOW, WOW, WOW!! Right on the very corner... what a truly spectacular & romantic setting.. Above & beyond our expectations.
Even the atmosphere & vibes of the whole restaurant are so relaxed & comforting

The food.. we opted to chose from the a la carte menu rather than the set menu.. sublime food throughout every course, with service.to match. 
 'Tomato cloud' Amuse bouche.. Mmmmm ..I could have eaten this all night!! Starters - My wife had scallops & I chose mushroom in pasta, both sprinkled with fresh truffle.

Mains - Both of us had the fillet steak, cooked medium & to perfection

Desserts - One raspberry & white chocolate mouse & one cheese cake which we shared, as you would.

All of this whilst sipping an excellent local sparkling Rose wine(Jagunic) from, in our opinion 'The Best table on the terrace' looking out at the Old City Walls & the sea... Lost for words.

On finishing our meal we were not rushed at all & retired to the lounge area where we were served complimentary after dinner drinks whilst listening to the excellent pianist, which just added to our already exceptional evening.

In summary:
When visiting the Old Town do not hesitate in booking the Nautika but remember to book well in advance as there are different areas/terraces to choose from, the front row tables where we were get booked up first for the obvious reason of the views.

It isn't cheap, but you only live once don't you, so save up & splash out! We're both positive that you will not be disappointed 

Thanks once again ALL at the Nautika for a truly memorable experience
From Dave & Susie(UK)

Amazing views and food experience!
From the time we walked in and were greeted until thd end of our dinner, everything was absolutely superb! We were seated on the upper terrace, the staff greeted us with warmth and professionalism!
The cocktails were the most we have ever paid but do worth it! The food was presented as a work of art! Everything was fresh and delicious!
Our waiter, Marijo, was friendly but maintained his professional throughout!
The Maitre’d, Tomislav, was sweet and friendly and we had a delightful conversation with him!
Highly recommend this restaurant as s truly culinary experience!!!!

The service was amazing. The view was amazing. The food was good. We enjoyed all courses. One to visit for sure if your not on a budget as it is very expensive. But an unreal experience so I would defiantly recommend
Such a lovely place with very professional staff. A high-level restaurant with delicious food. We had a great time, definitely will be back again.

AMAZING EXPERIENCE!!! From start to finish!! Maro was our server and he was outstanding. Super knowledgeable and an absolute sweetheart! The drinks were not only amazing but the presentation was 10/10. The food was all delicious!!! Our table ordered a mix between the lamb, tuna, and the beef. All wonderful choices!!! 1000% would recommend and will be back next time I visit Dubrovnik!
This is my third time at this restaurant and it never disappoints! Our server, Maro, was incredible. Must try!

We visited Nautika on the second night of our honeymoon and wow, what an evening! Our waiter - Maro - was amazing, knowledgeable and attentive. He gave us fantastic service and explained every dish we ate in amazing detail. The wine was wonderful and the food was out of this world! If you want a romantic dinner, this is definitely the restaurant for you!
Amazing time, great food and wonderful service. Beautiful views of old town. Marco is the best waiter ever, yas, king!

This was a beautiful dinner. I did email to make a reservation 1 month in advance. We did the 5 and 7 course tasting menu. I was so happy with the 5 course. My husband had the 7 course and it would have been too much food for me. Our waiter, Maro, was wonderful! He explained the dishes all so well and made our night enjoyable. Highly recommend!
Beautiful setting, lovely service, extensive wine list and wonderful local wines. All with a fabulous backdrop of the fortress and some lovely piano music throughout the evening.
Really nice food and service, strongly recommend! I’m sure I will take my friends here once I have any opportunity:)

Wonderful setting; super romantic. We were recommended Nautika by a friend and it did not disappoint. 
We had an amazing table overlooking the coastal line and opted for the 5 course tasting menu - we asked for a recommendation on a bottle of wine and the sommelier was second to none. 
Just fantastic service from beginning to end. Thank you for looking after us. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Super restaurant.
We watched the sun go down as we are on the terrace listening to a pianist play.
Food was exquisite.
Staff great.
Pricey of course- a treat

What an amazing experience tonight. Maro looked after us and nothing was too much trouble. The food was exquisite ( we had the 5 course tasting menu) the location was stunning. 
A truly memorable meal. A must for a visit to Dubrovnik.

We went to celebrate our engagement with my partner at Nautika. The staff was the friendliest I have ever encountered in my life – several of them personally came to congratulate us, and the house provided glasses of Champagne. Afterward, we enjoyed a five-course tasting menu, which was also the best seafood I have ever eaten in my life. Overall, the service, atmosphere, and of course, the food itself, exceeded all of my expectations. The best restaurant I have ever been to.

Mario is one of the best
Very polite and full of carisma 
Spot on to all the details all dinner along

Among the best, if not THE best, meal of my life. The service, food (5 course tasting menu), view — everything will create a night me and my wife will never forget as we celebrate both her birthday and our honeymoon

My boyfriend and I had a lovely evening at the Nautika- I'd 100% recommend! The setting is stunning, just outside the walls of the Old city- we got the seats on the terrace which has a beautiful view of the Old Fort. This is the kind of place which could so easily feel pretentious but the waiting staff are so warm & friendly they made us feel right at ease. Our waiter (Ivan-I hope i remembered it right!) was just super. I had a 3 course meal (sea food trio, beef & raspberry mousse ) the flavours and presentation of everything was top class. IF you have a big appetite try the tasting menu, it looked great! We booked about a month beforehand so make sure to make a reservation!
We had a fantastic dinner, the view is amazing and so is the food. Our waiter Maro was very kind and catered to all of our needs.
Amazing experience, beautiful food and top class service. Maro was such a delight and so accommodating and friendly. A gorgeous experience overall.

Lovely restaurant with great food and excellent service! Unfortunately this only day and exactly at that time we had our reservation, the thunderstorm arrived over Dubrovnik and we couldn’t enjoy the romantic view. But we had a light show directly from our table and it was experience itself. Highly recommend!
Amazing experience all around. The food, the service, the view, the wine. Would definitely recommend visiting for special occasions.

Being the number 1 restaurant in Dubrovnik and listed in the most beautiful restaurants in the world we had high expectations which, unfortunately, were not completely met.
We were greeted and sat at a fabulous table on the front row, the setting is quite reminiscent of The Cliff in Barbados. We then sat and sat, after several minutes and no water or menus we looked around to get a waiters eye, which we did and were duly given menus when we asked. Wine list is impressive as you would expect, Amuse bouche was like a savoury meringue which was a fantastic start. The starters were wonderful but spoilt by the lashings of truffle (see pictures) which for us were just too much. Main course tuna was lovely, sea bass flavours didn’t work for us however the pralines selection at the end was, like the Amuse Bouche simply wonderful.
So we had a lovely meal, it just wasn’t perfect and we would try somewhere else in the fine dining selection in Dubrovnik next time.
High class dining, very attentive staff. Our waiter Maro was amazing. Wonderful for a special night out during your travels in Dubrovnik. Probably not a great spot for families with children.

We were there for sunset time. The view of the restaurant is perfect and I would suggest you to go there for sunset too! Great service and kind waitress! The food is delicious even the portions are small and 💶🤣

Absolutely beautiful backdrop to a delicious and wonderful dinner. Marco the sommelier was awesome! Super knowledgeable and just a great guy. Highly recommend sitting on the main terrace to experience this amazing restaurant!

Had dinner here in the first row and was served by Maro, he was fantastic and recommended some great wine, the food I could not fault, had the cuttlefish to start, lamb for the main which you could cut like butter and coffee Carmel for desert recommended by Maro and he didn’t disappoint, great experience and food! Highly recommend a visit
Amazing food and amazing service! The best place to come in Dubrovnik! Will be coming back soon. Maro was magnificent!!

We enjoyed an evening at Nautika and we loved every minute of it. Thank you to the excellent staff for treating us so well, nothing is too much trouble. The food was delicious, we enjoyed a 5 course tasting menu which was perfect. We were advised on our wine choice as the wine menu is huge, but we enjoyed the choice which was made. The whole evening from start to finish was truly memorable in a unbelievable setting in Dubrovnik. We would thoroughly recommend this restaurant. Thank you.

We were here 5 years ago and it was spectacular - everything about it - the food, the service, the ambiance; while expensive, it was well worth it. Not so this visit. It's changed a lot in 5 years. The service tried, but it wasn't anywhere near what it was 5 years ago, and they seemed to be tripping over each other too often. The food also wasn't nearly as good. It was very off when compared to 5 years ago. Definitely not worth the price and we wouldn't go back.
And I have to say it, but all three of us got food poisoning, but that's not the reason for my negative review. It just wasn't worth the price and wasn't that good.
Amazing food and the service is top notch with an incredible view. Our server, Mario, made our wedding anniversary wonderful.
We came to celebrate our anniversary and we’re treated to an amazing dinner event. Our dinner was delicious only to be surpassed by the attentive and excellent white glove service we received.
Been here with my wife and had amaizing dinner with a spectacular view. Great service by Tomo and his guys... Place to recommend and place to come back!!!

My husband and I had an amazing and relaxing dinner. The view is stunning and the enthusiasm of our waiter, Maro, was much appreciated. He answered all of our questions with zest and excitement for the menu and it made our experience that much better. If the view isn't enough, there is a pianist that played the entire dinner to set the mood. We both got the beef fillet and it was life-changing.

Wow. White glove service with a view to old Dubrovnik and the sea. 

The service was literally the best. You will not find better service in Paris, New York or Milan. White gloves, perfectly attentive, helpful and friendly.

The wine list is not a list - it’s a huge book with over 650 bottles. You cannot go wrong! Definitely try the Croatian sparkling wine - Pavel Brut - so nice!

The food is Michelin-star quality. Every course was perfectly prepared and presented! 

Our dinner was 2 hours and 35 minutes - but we wanted to stay even longer. Nautika deserves every accolade!

Unrivaled excellence - from the professional greeting to the refined dining experience provided by Thomas and his staff flawless and impeccable, our thanks to Ivan who made our experience one to remember 

The food was outstanding the ambiance and setting delightful but it’s the meticulous attention to detail throughout our meal that left us speechless - so polished and sleek 

I can honestly say having eaten in top restaurants around the world that Nautika was up there with the best

Our thanks to everyone for such a wonderful memory of Croatia

The vegetarian menu is great

Amazing restaurant in a gorgeous location.
We ordered ala carte and all of our options were tasty and well presented.
The wait staff can not be faulted & the wine list selection is vast!

Amazing experience from start to finish. No doubt the top resturant in Dubrovnik. 
Maro, our waiter for the night was exceptional and the food was 10/10.

Outstanding food, service and views. We had the 5 course tasting menu and every dish was superb. The staff made a real effort to make our 9 year old daughter feel special with her rose lemonade mock tail which arrived in a birdcage, surrounded by rose petals. She loved it, we loved it. Highly recommend
Absolutely amazing experience! Great food, great wine and amazing service from our waiter Maro! Definitely recommend it. 10/10!

Where do I even begin with this disastrous dinner experience? From start to finish, it was an absolute catastrophe that left me with a profound sense of disappointment and a longing for the meal I could have had elsewhere.

Let's start with the ambiance. The restaurant boasted an elegant decor, but the atmosphere was anything but pleasant. The lighting was excessively dim, making it difficult to read the menu or see the abysmal food that was served. The noise level was deafening, making it impossible to hold a conversation without shouting. It was like dining in a chaotic cafeteria rather than an establishment that supposedly prided itself on fine dining.

The service was an absolute joke. The staff seemed disinterested and disengaged, as if they were doing us a favor by taking our orders. Our drinks took an eternity to arrive, and when they did, they were lukewarm at best. We had to repeatedly ask for simple requests, like utensils and napkins, which should have been readily available. It was as if the concept of attentive service was completely foreign to them.

Now, let's talk about the food. I ordered a supposedly "signature dish" that was recommended by the waiter, and it turned out to be an absolute disaster. The presentation was unappetizing, with sloppy plating that looked like it had been thrown together in a hurry. The taste was even worse. The meat was overcooked and tough, lacking any discernible flavor. The accompanying sides were bland and uninspiring, as if they were an afterthought. It was a dish that lacked any culinary finesse or creativity.

My dining companions fared no better. One had ordered a seafood pasta, which arrived cold and was swimming in an excessively oily sauce. The seafood itself was chewy and tasted stale. Another friend ordered a vegetarian option and was shocked to find that it consisted of a pile of undercooked vegetables that lacked seasoning or any depth of flavor.

To add insult to injury, the prices were exorbitant for the quality of the food and service we received. It felt like we were being charged for a five-star experience when we were served a meal that would be better suited for a cheap fast-food joint.

In conclusion, this dinner was an unmitigated disaster from start to finish. The lackluster service, unappetizing food, and inflated prices made it an experience that I wouldn't wish upon anyone. Save yourself the disappointment and seek out a different dining option where you can actually enjoy a satisfying meal and receive the service you deserve.

This beautiful restaurant was built right up on the cliff of the entrance to the Old City. My family and I dined on delicious sea bass and shrimp risotto and the restaurant provided a complementary little sweets tray at the end as we were too full to order a full dessert. It is definitely a unique dining experience.
The food was lovely en the service also perfect, the best from Maro!! Great place if you love wine and live music.

5/5 absolutely amazing on all accounts. Food, drink, setting and staff. A truly exceptional experience. Maro served us and went above and beyond during our meal. We celebrated a birthday and our engagement here. Thank you
Maro was the best server we have ever had in all of Europe! Beautiful scenery, dinner, and service! A must visit!
The place was amazing, the food to die for and our waiter Maro was knowledgeable, friendly and polite. Would definitely recommend 💯

Well worth the experience, and will definitely come again. Veal was spectacular, as was fish soup, Foie Gras, and Chocolate Dessert. For those of you thinking of dinning elsewhere, you get a wonderful experience for half of what you would pay for similar dinning in US, with live piano and ocean waves in background. Will be back!

A lovely restaurant with an exceptional view! The food was delicious, and the atmosphere was great! Very friendly staff. Good value for money. I am a vegetarian and there were some choices for me- not easy to find in this area!

This was right across the street from our hotel and we ate on the patio on a beautiful evening. right on the water to watch the sunset. Service is a bit over-the-top, but still friendly. Amazing cocktails that are a real show. Got a good bottle of Croatian wine. My husband has celiac disease and all desserts were GF, and they had GF bread. Great experience.

An exquisite restaurant overlooking the ocean, fort and old city walls.

The Maitre d' and his staff were all delightful and very welcoming as was the wonderfully enthusiastic Sommelier. 
Dinner was indeed 5* fine dining at it's very best.
