We chose from the a la carte menu - Steak for myself (cooked to absolute perfection) and Lobster Tail for my husband - the eclectic mix of flavours was utterly devine. This was accompanied by a delicious sparkling Croatian wine, Misal Blanc de Blanc.
A wonderful evening spent in a wonderful restaurant. Thank you.
By far this was our best fine dining experience in Croatia. The table was one of the best in Croatia and the food and wine selection were superb.
We had the tasting 5 courses menu, every course of top quality, excellent service from friendly staff, we finished of with an excellent Old Fashioned cocktail, can highly recommend it

Excellent service from Maro who attended to us through your our dinner with very detailed explanation on the ingredients and produce. Best thing about it is that he does it with passion! Food quality and taste is exquisite. Really enjoyed our time here. Great food, service and a magical view from the terrace! 

PS. Thanks to Anita for arranging a table with a splendid view!

Incredible! The food, service, wine and view were all absolutely brilliant. 

We had spent a previous evening at Dubrovnik 360, which I now regard as one of the top restaurant experiences in the world, however, Nautika came very close on the food and service.

I have to say that the view at Nautika was even better than Dubrovnik 360, so it would be difficult to separate the two restaurants - if you have the budget, visit them both!

Not only a breathtaking location with sumptuous food but the service was impeccable from Ivan the Tall. Attention to detail, seamless service, certainly was most welcome on such a stifling day. 
While away the hours whilst watching the sun set over the Dubrovnik city walls. Now that’s living! 
Thank you and we’ll done Ivan the Tall!

Phenomenal fine dining experience. The staff is attentive and friendly. We did the tasting menu. Could be one of the best best deserts ever. We spent the meal in the upstairs dining room which was private and luxurious and desert on the patio with an exceptional view.
Tasting menu was par excellence. Maro’s attention to detail and explanations on each course is much appreciated. We had a very enjoyable and memorable evening

The unmatched dining experience from the start until the end!

5 course taster menu, 5 beautifully made, balanced and planned dish complemented with a 5* service by Maro!

This restaurant should be awarded with some Michelin star! I am sure this will happen as hard work always pays off and this place with the people are doing their best!
Absolutely fantastic culinary experience topped off with the excellent Maro!! You couldn't ask for a better place to eat and treated like royalty!

The restaurant is recommended by the Hilton hotel concierge to us. It is an excellent recommendation. First night we get an inside seating. Food is excellent and also staff is very professional and knowledgeable. Good wine recommendations. 
The manager also introduced their sister restaurant and arranged the lunch booking with perfect view for us the next day at the top of the cable car station. We were so impress.
With all the above, we have decided to go for another dinning visit before we leave. We are so glad to have an outside seating arranged with a perfect view of the Old City Wall. Food and wine is consistently good as well as their hospitality.

We loved this restaurant. Everything was excellent and the views are to die for. The staff is very attentive. We did the tasting menu with wine pairing. I can say out of the several michelin restaurants we have tried this one definitely deserves a star. We will be back and highly recommend you make a reservation early.

Wednesday, 7:00pm: "Mr. F, this is Petra at Nautika. We had your reservation at 6:30. Are you still coming?" Nothing like this type of call to ruin the start of your evening when you realize you'd entered the wrong time in your calendar. I explained that to Petra and asked if we should still come...at 7:30pm. She was so gracious. "Yes, please do. You have your table (front row by the sea) until 9:15pm and if you're having desert at that time, please enjoy it in our inside seating area." We hurried and were seated at 7:30. I apologized to the manager and Mauro, our server. Within moments we were served drinks and appetizers as we gazed out at the beautiful view from our table. Four different olive oils were presented...one for each course. Each dish was sumptuous and creative in presentation. Mauro was efficient (he had to be as we were one hour late), friendly and engaging. At dessert (interestingly at 9:15pm, I offered to move from our table as I knew it was assigned but Mauro insisted, "No, sir. We've enjoyed having you. Please stay as long as you'd like." This was honestly a surprise as every table on the front row had indeed been turned. He then brought us Croatian dessert wine compliments of himself. I asked for the manager, complimented the entire experience and asked why they didn't have a Michelin star (or 2) and he was gracious, saying their focus is their customer. Well done, Nautika team. We'll be back.

Stunning food in a beautiful location. Staff were friendly and very attentive. The somelieir gave excellent recommendations to match our courses. All the dishes were seasoned well and presented beautifully. Mario needs a special mention for looking after us. Highly recommend

Ok, this was the most beautiful, romantic, 5-star restaurant we’ve ever been to; our seats on the terrace overlooking the old city and Adriatic was too amazing to describe. The food and service equaled the view; our server, Valentino, made the experience memorable for us with great attention to detail. Would highly recommend!
It was an amazing night with stunning views and great food. Maroje was a great waiter and made us feel very welcome.
Maro was an excellent waiter! The food, wine & cocktails were top class! All the staff were very helpful! Couldn’t recommend it enough

Wow, what an amazing experience! We’d heard good things about Nautika, but our expectations were totally exceeded. We went for the 7 course tasting menu and everything was delicious. We also tried a few local wines which paired perfectly with our food. The location is so scenic and the decor inside and out is lovely. Our table was on the terrace looking out to sea so we had a wonderful view. The Service really was top notch, all staff were fantastic and our waiter, Maro, is a real asset to the place. He made our evening all the more special, with his great knowledge and passion! Thank you!

This place is fabulously located on the water and the food was amazing. Highly recommend! Maro our server was not only knowledgeable about the menu but clearly passionate about each dish and individual ingredients.

Had a great time for my birthday. The food was excellent, very pricey but worth it. The waiter is very knowledgeable about each course which makes it a very interesting experience. The portions are just very small
Very beautiful spot with a great view. Definitely order fish and some dessert. Also great cocktails that add to the experience.
A great place to celebrate an anniversary: Superb food, excellent service and what a view! Mentioned in Guide Michelin, and for a good reason. Not cheap, but worth it in every way.

We were suspicious because of the amazing view and feared that they could then serve horrible food, but everything was fabulous. The view was amazing but the service, the wine and the food were incredible and if we were here another night, and we could get a reservation, we would come again.
5 stars for service, food, and location. Everyone in our group had a wonderful meal and the staff made it a memorable night.

Beautiful restaurant with live musician playing piano. We were welcomed with wonderful staff. Our waiter Maro was on point! He was very personable, attentive and knowledgeable. The food was delicious and the views were just as good! 

We even received complimentary chocolates for dessert and liquor which was a pleasant surprise!

10/10 would recommend to family and friends! 

Thank you again for a wonderful experience, Maro!

We had wonderful dinner here with great staff, view and food. We had fantastic seafood, but others appeared to be enjoying their meat dishes as well. Great wine suggestions. There are many restaurants to choose from inside the old city. This one is just outside and totally worth the extra walk. Close to the Hilton as well.

Arguably one of only several which should be considered the finest restaurant in Dubrovnik, Nautika Restaurant was the definition of elegant dining at its finest. Reservations to garner a table on the terrace with incredible views of the Adriatic Sea and Fort Lovrijenac were a must. The ambience in this beautifully-restored mansion was replete with live piano music suitable for the space and decor. 

It should come as no surprise that the food was beyond amazing. They made it very easy to order by providing tasting menu options with both five and seven courses. We opted for two of each to allow for the maximum tasting experience. However, should we have chosen to be more adventurous, we could also have cherry picked from their a la carte options which were extensive. Several bottles of the Posip Intrada were an uncomplicated pairing and excellent. It was truly a magnificent dining experience in Dubrovnik, but be forewarned that such excellence came at a price. The evening outing for four before gratuity was 825.99 euro...but definitely worth the price!

Had seven course tasting menu. Every course was spot on. Veal dish was more well done than I cared for, however, it still rated 4.5 stars. Service was impeccable. Advise make reservations much in advance as possible.
Amazing restaurant, food and view is second to none and Maro was incredible, such great service! Would definitely go back!

I wanted our last night in Dubrovnik to be extra special so I searched hard for the perfect spot. Based on stellar reviews, I chose Nautika and booked it months in advance. Once we arrived, someone downplayed it, which made me hesitate for a moment. But we stuck with it, for which I’m thrilled because it was the crown jewel of our tour of the Balkans! We were seated in the second row from the wall, which was beautiful, facing the illuminated St. Lawrence with amazing views of the Adriatic. The service was top notch, white glove service across the board. Our cocktails were imaginative and theatrically presented. The food was sublime across the board. Like most people, I don’t mind paying a lot for truly good cuisine but despise feeling ripped off. Don’t worry because Nautika delivered. I was ready for an upscale meat dish. The steak was cooked to perfection and the accompaniments were lovely. Dessert was a work of art and the wine with our entrees sealed my new love for Croatian reds. We marveled at the service. And it was great value! I was ready to break the bank but didn’t need to! Thank you, Nautika, for a beautiful meal and an overall unforgettable dining experience!

Spectacular setting, incredible food, superb wine list and attentive service.
I seldom write restaurant reviews because I'm a miserable bugger and I am rarely impressed, but Nautika truly is an exceptional dining experience. It delivers a unique and highly memorable 5* taste of Croatia.
We had 6 couples for dinner at Nautika. We sat in the upper outdoor terrace. The view was spectacular, and the service and cuisine were superb. Highly recommend!

Beautiful dinner in an amazing location, great experience. Delicious food with excellent service. A must try experience when in Dubrovnik! Shout out to our waiter Maro who helped create such a memorable dinner!

I don’t even know where to begin here. Absolutely EVERYTHING was amazing! The staff was friendly and very helpful with explaining the meals. The ambiance was perfect - outdoors in May, beautiful breeze off the water as we sat outside and enjoyed an amazing seven course tasting menu with wine pairings. I have to start with the wine - they were all Croatian wines and they were some of the best I’ve ever had. The tasting meal included veal, shrimp, cuttlefish, cheese, and dessert. I was so full but couldn’t pass up the tasty food. Our server, Super Mario, was kind, knowledgeable, and on top of everything. He never missed a beat and was so personable. They all were. I highly recommend this place. It is a bucket list trip and this was a bucket list meal that I will never forget.

If you would like a special night out, Nautika is it. The white glove service (literally) was fantastic, the cocktails and food were impressive, and the view is spectacular. The portions are not meant to be shared so keep this in mind when you order - we are a family who shares appetizers but these were a bit small to do so. There were little surprises from the chef in between and some fun theatrics with the preparation. Definitely recommend.
It has a great atmosphere in a perfect location and settings. We had some of the best grill fish there. The service was great and we had a great time just to enjoy the moments.

Beautiful spot and view overlooking the sea. Food - INCREDIBLE. We loved it all, everything felt so special, the staff are so helpful and lovely, with great recommendations. Loved everything - recommend the beetroot and tuna tartar! Delish 😋
This place is top notch and highly recommended and exceeded expectations! Maro my server was exceptional! Fine dining at its best!
We had the BEST dinner! The view, the service and mostly the food was incredible! Mato was so kind and attentive. We will be back♥️
Beautiful setting of course - could hardly be better. We had fresh grilled fish which was good but not as good as the grilled fish we have had in other restaurants in Croatia.
Excellent food and service! The waiters were very helpful and explained each dish. Food was prepared perfectly. Wine was expensive but very good.

All I can say is fabulous, if your visiting Dubrovnik and you want a fabulous dinner experience Nautika is the place to be.

The venue 10/10
The ambiance 10/10
The food 9.5/10
The drinks 10/10
The service 100/10

I'm guessing your wondering why I gave the food 9.5/10 portion size only, its a MICHELIN star restaurant small portion are normal but I would of love 2 more lamb pieces as they were so good. 

We had the Shrimps and Scallop hot starters with the Lobster Tail & Lamb Dalmatia for our main and it all was fabulous. 

They have a great wine selection (over 600) but I personally order the cocktail which I loved. 

You will receive a full white glove service from when you reach the door until you leave and I love that. The service wasn't stuffy everyone that serviced us had great personality and made us feel very welcomed. 

Thank you to everyone that work on Sunday (esp Mario) it was a lovely evening.
The most amazing view the town has to offer. Perfect for a romantic dinner. The service is exquisite. We have been looked after by Maroje.excellent service
Beautiful location, experience out of this world. Amazing chef - lobster a dream come true! Mica took good care of us! Thank you - we will be back!
Amazing good, spectacular dinner eith breathtaking views!!!! Where else would you rather be? Thanks to Mica - what an absolute star! Loved every second!

Maro, our main waiter, was friendly, helpful and attentive. He’s a very passionate and proud local who helped make our special celebration even more special. The food was outstanding and the romantic setting and views are perfect. The best way to end our stay in Dubrovnik.

What a perfect dinner during our honeymoon. we sat at the edge of the main terrace overlooking Fort Lovrijenac. We had such an amazing view, and the sound of the waves crashing on the rocks below really set the mood. The service from Ragusino and the rest of the staff was absolutely perfect. and the food was fun and delicious. We will recommend Nautika to anyone visiting Dubrovnik.

Everything about this restaurant was amazing! The pianist when you arrive, the decor, food, staff were impeccable, couldn’t fault anything!
Loved Mario and his colleagues sense of humour they made the experience even more enjoyable, they looked after us so well and made us feel so welcome - thank you
The service was amazing and so was the food! Would absoloutly recomend! 10/10 for the service!
The food was amazing and all local a simple but sophisticated menu. The service was the best Maro and his team were attentive to our every need!

The food is incredible, service is impeccable and views are stunning. We received a very warm, friendly greeting and all staff were extremely hospitable. Special mention to Maro who was so attentive and knowledgable. Highly recommended.

Just had the most enjoyable birthday dinner here and just had to write a review before I forget. 
The setting is second to none. Truly spectacular location just outside the city walls of Dubrovnik with views of the Adriatic and the fortresses of Lovrijenac and Bokar.
The food was an absolute triumph.
Every single dish was masterfully balanced in flavour and exquisitely presented.
We have eaten in many a Michelin starred restaurant and I would say that this restaurant is easily up there with them!
The white gloved waitstaff were effortlessly friendly, genuinely happy to serve us and so attentive that literally nothing went unnoticed! Glasses were filled without you even noticing, serviettes placed back on your lap after you returned from the bathroom and pictures taken with grace and good humour.
Cannot praise this restaurant enough for a wonderful and memorable dinner.
Well done and keep it up

This is an amazing restaurant!! The food is spectacular, the service incredible and the view, breathtaking! Our waiter, Maro, and his crew were simply amazing. Every part of this meal and experience was special! Highly recommend for a beyond special time in Dubrovnik, Croatia. AN AMAZING EXPERIENCE OVERALL!

Mica was excellent waiter🤩
-he has humor and good attitude ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
One of our best experience in Croatia
Maro, our server, was excellent. The setting couldn’t be more perfect & to top it off the 5 course menu & wine pairing was absolutely delicious. Loved every second of this experience.

This restaurant is located right next to the old town and has fantastic views of the city wall and the sea.

In early May, the evenings can be a bit windy so conveniently this restaurant has outdoor heaters they can place by your table.

One word - outstanding! We visited here in May 2023 and we were served by Maro who treated us like royalty. He explained each dish to us in detail and couldn’t do enough for us. All the waiters were top class. Such an incredible experience with outstanding food and beautiful scenery! We will be back!
Absolutely amazing dinner at Nautika and exceptional service from our waiter Maro. Every dish and drink suggestion was perfect!
Really enjoyed all the food but especially the scallop &lobster:) also really good view and even more excellent service by Maroje for anniversary dinner! Hope to visit again:)

Absolutely an incredible experience. We enjoyed our dinner so much. The food was incredible. We did the 5 course tasting menu which was fabulous. Exceptional service and a wonderful view. The complete experience!

This is the best restaurant in my entire trip in Croatia. Mica, the waiter in charge of our table, is perfect for the occasion. He is a man with character and most suitable for this dining experience. Food and dessert are fantastic.
Could not have been better. Mr. Nikolich was very attentive but not overbearing. He was very informative on each item on the menu. View CANNOT be beat. 10/10 recommend.
Splendid Service by Darko, a perfect meal - a wonderful evening with an outstanding view and an overall amazing experience. Thank you so much
Fantastic dinner for a romantic night out. We had the best service with Mr. Ragusino and his colleagues.

My wife enjoyed a tremendous 7-course tasting menu, against a beautiful backdrop, served by talented and caring staff, including the wonderful Mica. It really couldn't have been any better. And what a wine list! One of my best meals in recent memory. A "must" visit while in Dubrovnik.
Nautika is top notch on the culinary world stage, and Mica is the star of the show!!! Absolutely blown away by the setting, the ambience, the food and the service. Do we have to leave…?!?

Perfect spot for a dinner by the sea - we came at 6:30 and the sunset was mesmerising. Food is great and the cocktail was amazing. Shoutout to Mica who is very observant and knowledgeable - he noticed that we were a bit cold from the breeze and immediately offered an (extremely soft) blanket!
Just perfect! Great dinner experience! Mr Nikolich, knows what wines to recommend with each food!!! The all staff was above and beyond! And the food, OMG, the food!!!! It was heavenly!!!

We ate at the Nautika for dinner having selected the 5 course menu. All the dishes were delicious and of high quality, particularly if you like seafood. Nevertheless, the absolute highlight was the dessert; imagine a giantic Ferrero-Rocher ball filed with a delicious chocolate mouse. The service was friendly and attentive, and the setting is fantastic with a view on a bay, the walls of Dubrovnik and a fortress. Make sure to book a table in the front row overlooking the sea. The waiter also provided help for choosing a nice local white wine bottle (POSH, 2019). Yes, the whole experience is pricey but it comes with the location. We had no regrets, and enjoyed every bit.

If you're looking for an unforgettable dining experience in Dubrovnik, look no further than Nautika! From the moment we walked in, we were greeted warmly by Maro, our waiter, who was absolutely delightful throughout the entire meal.

Mark’s knowledge of the menu and the roots of all ingredients was impressive, and he was able to make excellent recommendations based on our preferences. We tried the tasting menu, and each one was better than the last (literally.. the desert was the best desert I’ve ever had) The seafood was incredibly fresh and expertly prepared, and the flavours were truly outstanding. It was clear that the chefs take great pride in their work and use only the finest ingredients.

But it wasn't just the food that made this dining experience so memorable - it was the entire atmosphere. The restaurant is located by the Adriatic Sea and we could hear the waves crashing down as we enjoyed our evening. The staff were all friendly and attentive and the sommelier was knowledgeable and candid, making us feel welcomed and cared for.

All in all, I can't recommend Nautika highly enough. If you're in Dubrovnik, make sure to book a table and ask for Maro - he truly made our evening unforgettable.
Great food and environment. Superb service by Maro, he was super friendly and had great recommendations for food and drinks.
Sublime. Food exceptional. Service extraordinary. Maro made it all perfect for our wedding anniversary.

The service was exceptional from start to finish. The food was not only beautiful, but delicious too. I made our reservation two months prior to our visit to ensure a front row seat on the balcony. There are several exceptional dining options in Dubrovnik and I’m glad we chose this one.

Wonderful dinner and evening. Sat in the front row of the terrace with a stunning view. The five course tasting menu was excellent, and the service perfection and delightful. Two and a half hour of joy...for $500
Maro is my favorite waiter since a long time after visiting so many premium restaurants, highly recommended!
We had the loveliest dinner experience here. Fantastic food, beautiful views and very attentive and friendly staff who are willing to accommodate dietary requirements. Would very much recommend.
Unbelievable! Such great service. Marlo is an incredible server! Great food, beautiful view and the best service makes this place a must do in Dubrovnik!

we wanted to pull out the stops for one super dinner in Croatia. This sounded like the right thing. Had great reviews. Voted one of the most romantic restaurants in the world. What could possibly go wrong?
In fact, nothing. It was sensational start to finish. Now our guide that day, who livedin Montenegro and had lived in DUbrovnik, volunteered that he didn't htink it was worth the money. That was the only thing we disagreed with him about that day!
With a place like this, it is about many factors. Price, service, food prep, wine list, setting. We've eaten at a handful of similar places - The French Laundry in California, Scholteshof in Stevoort Belgium (sadly a thing of the past); Commander's palace in New Orleans, Post Rio in SF; Le Bec Fin in Philadelphia, and Castle Treyne in France...This was solidly up there in competition with these.
First of all, the service was masterful. our main waiter was Ivan, whose English was perfect. He was very affable, immediately noticed and struck up a conversation about my camera. Additionally, our beverages were served by the sommelier and the recommendations were spot on. Bread and water were constantly being replenished; the bread was world class excellent, and this isn't just filler food; with the sauces and the olive oils supplied, you needed something to get every drop.
Speaking of olive oils, this was the first and only place i've ever been that featured an olive oil progression. They served us at least 4 local olive oils of varying complexity and what a great idea. Hence the enormous amount of bread consumed. 
We got aperol spritzes to start and a bottle of award winning local sauv blanc which i found to be superior to many of the california and new zealand standards; it was less sour and more flinty and minerally and we loved it.
We both opted for the five course tasting menu. It was about $130 euro; this place wasn't cheap. If we had ordered a la carte it would probably have topped $200 a person just for food, and the dishes were all part of the a la carte menu anyway. This was pushing molecular gastronomy; there were a few very small but superb courses. The soup course was ample; the dessert was marvelous. 
Although guide books continue to insist that tipping is unnecessary in Croatia, we asked Ivan if this was the case and he said no; they expected a tip; our total bill including drinks and wine came to $420 US.
Did I say that our table was adjacent to the wall overlooking the Adriatic, with the walls of Dubrovnik a hundred feet away and Fort Lovrijenac a hundred feet to the right. 
Here's the tasting menu from their website:
Tuna Tartare
slightly smoked tuna, orange chutney, wasabi mayonnaise, lemon, bruschette
Fish Soup
white fish mosaic, parsley fluid, mussels
Shrimps
semolina gnocchi, beurre blanc, parsley cream, almonds
White Fish Fillet
served on a bed of cherry tomatoes and young spinach leaves, olive oil and vanilla cream
Chocolate
chocolate, hazelnut, gold
Would we recommend it for a splurge? Definitely. NO regrets.
The best restaurant we have ever been too… the view and food was unreal but the service was just out of this world.. cannot recommend enough !
What a treat in Dubrovnik - everything was absolutely exceptional - both food and the service from our server Maro were top notch! And yes, the location and the view couldn’t be better!
Fantastic meal, incredible gin and tonic, made even more special by our wonderful waiter Maro. We will be back! Not one to be missed!
The venue is incredible, the food is out of this world! The service is the best I’ve ever experienced. We came for my birthday and we’re treated like royalty. The best food we have ever eaten

Nautika is located just outside of Pile Gate opposite the fort and city walls. The view is amazing, especially in the front row of the terrace. Blankets and heaters made outdoor seating comfortable despite the chilly temperatures and the rain shower (the terrace can be covered which does not only provide shade in summer, but also protection against rain). 
Service is very professional and attentive, and the sommelier was very knowledgeable and passionate about local wines which translates into a very impressive wine list. Food was very tasty and flavorful, we went for the five course tasting menu and very much enjoyed each course. 
Live music by a piano player added to the exclusive fine dining experience.
Beautiful location (view of the sea 😍), delicious food, and amazing service (Maro really took care of us!). Highly recommend for a memorable night when visiting Dubrovnik.

My wife and I had an unforgettable evening at Nautika in Dubrovnik.

The food was absolutely perfect - each dish was delicious, presented beautifully and executed flawlessly. We paired our meal with local Croatia wine which was an excellent choice. 

The attention to detail and level of service provided by the staff was impeccable, they truly made us feel special. The experience at Nautika was akin to dining at a Michelin starred restaurant, with the service and taste worthy of such an accolade.

But most importantly, the atmosphere was enchanting, romantic and unforgettable. Dining while under a perfect starry full moon sky, feeling the cool April breeze, it was the perfect romantic first row setting.

Overall, I would highly recommend Nautika to anyone who wants a memorable dining experience in Dubrovnik. It will definitely be one of the highlights of your trip.
Mark was a prefect waiter and host. Super friendly. Amazing food. Fantastic views. Best birthday dinner ever.

We sat outside and despite chilly weather and a bit of wind we had an amazing experience. The service was excellent and the food exquisite. Cozy blankets and heat lamps kept us warm while we enjoyed one of a kind views and a delicious white wine from the Dalmatian region. After dinner we sipped a local liqueur while listening to live piano music. Highly recommend!

A very beautiful evening all round. The food was exquisite and Maro gave us an incredible dining experience.

We had the risotto to start and the tuna and seabass for main. Each dish was divine!

Nautika was the highlight of our trip. Thank you, Maro!
Food was incredible and Maro's knowledge and hospitality was amazing for the whole evening. Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik. Get the shrimp starter!
Amazing/ best service ever, highly recommended, very accommodating & on point with service to whatever we needed.

The food and the service is excellent. Maro has taken very good care of me and I really enjoyed every second, very good recommendations for food and vine and the best smile ever! Thanks to him and the whole team, this was a very memorable evening in Dubrovnik. I highly recommend visiting Nautika!

We had the most amazing evening here. Superb romantic location, awesome food and tastes. The wine pairing was perfect. My husband thoroughly enjoyed his birthday and I earned tons of brownie points! Highly recommend

The meals were delicious and the service was excellent throughout. We had the 5 course tasting menu and Maro our host for the night was excellent. We were offered new cocktails on the house as tasters, and the team couldn't do enough for us. Overall, it was a beautifully memorable experience.

We were recommended to this restaurant by several different locals in Dubrovnik so it was an easy choice for a celebratory last dinner before leaving for Italy. It did not disappoint! We ensured a booking the night before and so had a good idea of prices and thought it would be worth the extra $s for the occasion, we were not dispointed. In fact a comparable restaurant in other cities of tourist acclaim would have come out a lot more expensive. 
From waiting for our terrace table on a balmy evening and sipping on signature gin and vodka drinks, listening to the grand piano being played, to the complimentary liqueurs at the end of the night - everything was perfect. 
No less than 3 waiters at any one time attended us with the fine dining experience. And they were all delightful people ensuring we had everything we needed. This made the evening an even better one. Every course was explained in detail and was mouth wateringly great!
The lobster tail on soft handmade pasta was outstanding. My friends tuna was amazing apparently! The entrees were mouth tingling excursions of taste. 
All in all a memorable experience I can highly recommend.
Stopped in for a drink while awaiting dinner reservations elsewhere, but was overwhelmed with the views of the Adriatic. this one is worth finding!

My family and I celebrated our daughter´s birthday at this marvelous place downtown Dubrovnik. Where to start?
Our host Mr. Ragusino took special care of us throughout the entire evening. His recommendations and menu suggestions hit the spot. The Foie gras served as an overture followed by five and seven course menus, demonstrated the quality of meditaranian cuisine at its best accompanied by excellent croatian sparkling wine. Highlights of the set menus were the Beef Charolais Carpaccio, the Shrimps on top of semolina gnocchi and the tuna fillet with fennel tripthi without spoiling any further details. Silent piano music, the sea breeze and the historical setting completed the wonderful evening.

Wow...10 of us had a combination of the 7 and 5 course tasting meals and it was INCREDIBLE. The service from Mr Maroje was superb and he could not have been more attentive and friendly. The entire meal was delicious and so beautiful. If you're looking for a special night, this is the place to go to.
Thomas's and Ivan's attention was the best 👌. This is one of the best experiences ever because of the dedicated service and the great views. Recommend 100% 👍

We visited this restaurant to celebrate our anniversary - and had a wonderful evening. The food, wine and service were all exceptional. Mario even discretely surprised us with a 'congratulations' plate at the end of our meal which was unexpected and lovely!!
Beautiful place, with views of "Kings Landing" . Good food. Great selection of local wines. Mica was an excellent host.
Beautiful views, excellent food and great service. Worth every penny. We had the tasting menu which was brilliant but we also saw otherr dishes from the menu.

Absolutely amazing, a must visit if you’re in the area. We went as a coupe and enjoyed the tasting menu with wine pairings. Amazing value for money and wonderful views only topped by fantastic service by our waiter and sommelier who were both exceptional!! Thank you.
Maro did a great job and made a wonderful meal truly spectacular. If you appreciate service, you’ll love this place. And the view was awesome!

This place came highly recommended, it’s on the Michelin Guide. 
The service was generally pretty good, they were very accommodating to our requests and the views were special.
The food was absolutely beautiful. The service from our waiter Maro was amazing. He was very attentive and helpful. I will definitely recommend this restaurant.

My husband and I had an amazing dinner here on our honeymoon! The food was incredible — I did the five course tasting menu, highly recommend! — and the service was impeccable. Our waiter, Mr. Ragusino, was kind, informative, and went out of his way to help us celebrate our honeymoon. We truly enjoyed our experience, and I would recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a superb meal in a wonderful setting.

Its a heavenly place absolute Beauty of Croatian vibes, enjoyed savoring high quality dinner with astonishing view , warming hospitality and unforgettable experience. For sure it added sparkle to our stay in Beautiful Dubrovnik. Thank you .

OMG over the top dining experience. Start with the setting overlooking Lovrijenac Fortress across the emerald waters. first class attentive service from numerous staff. Maro was the star professional but personable, willing to converse and laugh.

What about the food? Yes, yes, yes. They will rock your world! Artfully presented. Layers of flavors tantalizing your tongue. Wine pairing by the kind, not pushy sommolier. 

Go big and splurge for a most memorable dining experience. You'll be reflecting on it for a long time.
Came in October for our honeymoon, great hospitality from Maro, food was decent and one of the best view of Dubrovnik.

First Michelin rated restaurant we ever went to. Very fancy. The wait staff was super attentive. The vine list was actually a “book”! The waiter said it had 600 vines. The food was all about presentation and very good but I wouldn’t say superb.

Everything about the place is outstanding, the food, service and atmosphere. Sitting outside over the rocks is beautiful. Be sure to ask for first row on main terrace. The service is literally white glove. All very attentive without pretension. The food was outstanding. We started with shrimp risotto which was very good. Then the fois gras which was incredible. We both had the lamb Dalmatian which we both thoroughly enjoyed. And the chocolate for dessert, terrific. It was my partner’s birthday and they made an effort for it. It is worth the money

My wife and I celebrated 10-year wedding anniversary at Nautika. We received upgraded seating on the first row facing the ocean. The food was great but what stands out is the scenery and especially the service. We were well taken care off by a waiter named Ivan. It struck me how relaxed and friendly the service was while still being very professional. It’s probably the best service I have ever experienced. We also received a special desert celebrating our anniversary.
Had an amazing experience, great food. We had the lobster and beef, it was the best quality meat we’ve ever had. Would highly recommend. Thank you Maro for the great service.

The restaurant was highly suggested and we were NOT disappointed. It was the best service and food we have had in our entire lives. Valentino and the other servers did an amazing job describing dishes, suggesting wine pairings and telling us about the local culture/cuisine. An amazing view too!!

It was so fantastic
The server Maro was fantastic
My shrimp was delicious and the wine list amazing!! Try the bisque!!
The restaurant was in a prime location outside the Old Town, beautiful view, excellent service, and best of ALL delicious food, Impeccable!!!

Loved the staff's ability to share details of food preparation. The food is of course, excellent. Cost is a bit up there but you will not get this experience anywhere else. As a one of a kind experience, you simply gotta pay it and enjoy.
Nice ambience with good food and wine. the ambience is great with soft live music around. Definitely worth a second visit.
Maro was very great. Beautiful view and experience. Food was amazing. Highly recommend for anyone visiting Dubrovnik
Just had one of the best meals ever at nautika, food service and the view were unreal. Hopefully you get maro as your waiter who just adds to the perfect night x

Maro was fantastic all evening from the first course to the last. He was knowledgeable, had great recommendations and even sprinkled in a history lesson or two! Will absolutely be back to dine next time we’re in town.

We came here for dinner and the views and food were absolutely amazing! We had Maro as our server and it was the best service I’ve ever received. Highly recommend this restaurant it will not dissapoint!

This was a total experience for the eyes and the palate. Called at the last minute because of a problem with another reservation and was so lucky to have them fit my friend and I in. We started with an exquisite martini. I know you re probably saying what can be so special but believe me, Dubrovnik and many other cities have a very different idea of a martini than I do. We went on to our first course which for me was a luscious scallop plate and then followed by a rack of perfectly cooked lamb. The wine was also really enjoyable. If you can get in, you will enjoy a lovely evening here.
Outstanding, focused service. Maro was Excellent! We had an INCREDIBLE experience . The attention to detail, and explanations of each course were perfection. An outstanding experience at Nautika!

Honestly this is hands down the best meal we have had the whole time we have been here. Maro was our waiter and he was super knowledgable, helpful, fun and kind. Our experience was incredible. You have to try the tortellini and the beef fillet!

It was my birthday and my partner booked a table for us at Nautika.
They originally placed us next to the entrance outside and then we were moved 2nd row closer to the sea. Then eventually got the main terrace which was the original booking. Everything went from average to amazing, big shout out to the chefs, Josep and Mr.Maro for accommodating and making my 30th a great start to the decade!

OMG!! One of the best meals of my life! I ordered the shrimp/caviar bisque, scallop truffles, and Dalmatian lamb chops. Literally one of the best meals of my life, might actually be THE BEST MEAL! Our server Maro was the sweetest and made sure we were well taken care of. He was so genuine and always smiled!! We sat 1st row at Nautika and couldn’t have been a better experience. I highly recommend!!! I went with my girlfriend but am convinced I will come back to Croatia with husband to experience it all. Will also request Maro again! He was wonderful!!!

We ordered wines, tuna tartare, bisque, scallop, lamb, and the coffee & caramel dessert. The food was amazing and service was beyond excellent. Our waiter, Maro, was also kind enough to bring us complementary drinks, palate cleansers, and additional desserts. Overall, this was a 10/10 experience and I would totally come back again. I also felt very full and satisfied from the meal, cant wait to return! Thank you Maro for the perfect 1st time Nautika experience!

We spent our last dinner after two weeks exploring Croatia at this former sailing school now elegant and upscale restaurant with one of a kind views. I noted in our online reservation that we were celebrating our wedding anniversary and we were pleasantly surprised to be seated at one of the best table with breathtaking views of the walls and fort (and for you GOT fans, “black water bay”).

As you’d expect at a gourmet spot like this service was provided by tuxedo clad, white gloved servers with their minion of assistants. Our waiter Maro took excellent care of us and helping with our choices. The food is as artful as it is flavorful with explosions of flavors and textures. The amuse buche was a “tomato cloud”-a melt in your mouth merengue with a dollop of tomatoey flavor on top. For starters my wife had the warming carrot and apple soup while I had the prawns with gnocchi and almonds. Each was a modest size but packed with flavor. We decided to split the sea bass as our main served with toasted pine nuts and tiny roasted tomatoes. For dessert the chocolate which resembled an over side ferra roche chocolate with a creamy hazelnut filling.

There were also some tiny handmade chocolates from the kitchen and as a special treat another plate and a local liquor to commemorate our anniversary. The wi e list features over 600 choices so best to rely on the knowledgeable sommelier.

Definitely the most memorable (but also most pricey) meal during our two weeks in Croatia and a fitting finale.

Wow what can I say, we had the 7 course menu and it was incredible. Fresh delicious food and the best service with an incredibly knowledgable waiter providing wine options. A must for any couple celebrating something special

Classy experience from the get go.
We arrived and were seated in prime position on the main terrace front row with a magnificent view out across the ocean between the city walls on the left and fort lovrijenac on the right. Our waiter brought over the little wooden table which subsequently took the strain of the wine encyclopaedia we were presented with (they have over 4000 choices). Rather handily they have an in house sommelier to help and we had a cracking grasevina (Croatian white wine).
We then enjoyed the complimentary pallet cleanser dish from the chef and the fabulous never ending bread basket (mini rolls baked in house, served with great local olive oil). Enjoyed three courses of beautifully presented and great tasting dishes before finishing with a complimentary cocktail.
The whole atmosphere and ambiance along with the staff and service make this a great place for a special meal with your significant other.
We really dined rather than just eating.

Maro and the wonderful staff and chef at Nautika are not to be missed when visiting Dubrovnik. This is the place for a special memory and extraordinary meal
And dining experience.
This restaurant is jack ass. The waiters and waitresses made us feel at home it was by far the best restaurant in Croatia and we were very happy when we left.

The most wonderful windswept evening. The food was delicious and the service very friendly.The staff were very adaptable coping with the weather. The wine recommendations meant that we had the perfect accompaniment to the perfect meal

Myself and my husband visited Nautika on Friday night for dinner. The setting is beautiful only if you get to sit on the front row over looking the sea. The food was average and extremely overpriced. The service was good but unfortunately not enough to ever bring us back or recommend it to anyone.

This restaurant is worth every penny. We chose the 7 course tasting menu, because, well, why not? Every course was more delicious than the previous one, and I have to say that the tuna fillet with fennel foam was absolutely memorable. Croatia is known for its tuna, but this was a cut above in presentation and cookery with a sear on the outside and the perfect pink on the inside. The whole setting is magical with the moonlight over the restaurant. But the biggest kudos goes to the service which is white glove. A special thank you to Valentino who made the evening for us. He was always so professional but also very welcoming and we had a good laugh or two and I have to say that he took the best photo of me and my husband with that gorgeous background. We have eaten in some top notch restaurants throughout Europe and I have to say that Nautika rates among the very best. Everything was absolutely perfect from the communication for the reservation through to the food and the service. A most memorable evening!

We have wanted to visit Dubrovnik and have dinner at Nautika for several years but covid disrupted our plans. We finally made it, third time lucky and it truly was a memorable evening.
We sat at the best table with beautiful views of the sea and fortress.
We chose the 5 course tasting menu and enjoyed every course which was accompanied by a different, locally made oil olive. The sea bass was the stand out for me. All the staff were superb, the cocktail waiter mixed the drinks in front of us and at the finish we were presented with a tray of liqueurs to choose from all of which he had made.
Our waiter, Maro was very attentive and knowledgeable, he explained every course and all about the locally sourced ingredients.
The whole evening was magical, in a stunning, romantic location. I highly recommend booking a table at this enchanting restaurant.

Had a very special meal in Nautika last night. Superior food, delicious wine, all served by Maro, who has just the right level of attentiveness and charm. Altogether a marvelous experience. Highly recommended.
The food was spectacular, the service matched this and the waiters went out of their way to make everything a perfect experience. Would highly recommend this restaurant.
Every course was perfectly paired with wine. We had the 7 course meal. Our server Maro was amazing!! He was gracious and professional. We will definitely be back!!

A beautiful evening of incredible food, fabulous local wine and a stunning display from the swallows. The sunset added to the experience. 

Thank you to Maro and the rest of the staff for making our anniversary evening so very special.

I only am giving this 4 stars and not 3 because of the location, the fantastic white glove service and the level of detail and passion on the service side.

On background I travel a lot and very frequently dine in one star michelin in Europe, US and Asia.

I had the 7 course menu and the execution and presentation in short description must be described as dull and unimaginative.

For a 170 euro tasting menu, a baisser with ketchup is Not a satisfactory amuse bouche.

The „carpaccio „ was a single slice of beef topped with chiffonade and croutons. That was very outdated and bland. The balsamic pearls didnt save it, underseasoned too.

Bisque was very flavorful but not strained and could have been hotter, the caviar atop of crustacean tartar had dried up and too mustve been pre prepped as part of afternoon mice en place.

The best course was the tuna with shaved fennel followed by a main course that i have had on regular banquet dinners. Do something hearty here like sous vide or slow cooked croatian/dalmation lamb or beef.

Dessert was ice cold and heavily pre prepped awkwardly served with a salty waver. Its cold on the terrace. Serve something with hot cold and warm components.

I feel the place could thrive under a fresher and more up to date menu and execution. Get relevant and creative.

I would likely try all the other fine dining locations in Dubrovnik before i give this one a try again.

Perfect setting, perfect service, perfect food. We had the 7course taster menu and each bite didnt disappoint absolutly stunning. The somelier was very knowledgable and his wine list extensive perfect for a wine lover novice or beginner alike. The view was next level highly recommend.

The best you will ever experience, you will not find this level of service and ambiance anywhere! 
The food is exquisite and the setting is amazing. 

We didn’t want to leave.
Lovely staff, delicious food, amazing views. Really great setting for a nice intimate time with your loved ones.

The food is fabulous, the service is outstanding and you can't beat the view of the wall from Game of Thrones! Seriously, a lovely 5 star experience for our first night in Dubrovnik. Love this place❤️❤️❤️

We visited Nautika in July and it was truly special. Our booking had moved a few times due to Covid but luckily we could still get a reservation for our new dates. From the moment we arrived until the moment we left it was just wonderful. Amazing service. A beautiful setting and some of the best food we have eaten. I still often think of the dishes. An evening that we will look back on and smile at the memory. We highly recommend and would definitely return on our next visit. Thank you all for creating a spectacular experience.
We had the menu of 5 courses…it was delicious in a beautiful setting…thx to Maroje, Valentino and Rajka for the personal service. Top!

Delicious food! Beautiful views! Fantastic staff! I had the pleasure of being served by Maroje, Valentino and Rajwa, they were so lovely and made my evening truly magical! I would definitely recommend visiting!

We had the best team take care of us during our time at Nautika:Vinko, Viktor & Maroje (thank you!!) They were very helpful, attentive and knowledgeable about the menu. They were so kind and a pleasure to be around. The food was incredible. Simple and full of flavor! Definitely recommend!

Beautiful meal. Excellent location. Delicious wine. Exquisite service. What more could you ask for?Our best meal in Dubrovnik by far. Thank you so much to Maroje, Vinko, and Victor for looking after us so well.

If you’re wishing to experience a high end and classy 5 star restaurant, this is sure to meet all of those expectations.

The service is impeccable and the food is devine…set right near the old town on the water!

A place to create memories!

We had a beautiful meal for our one year anniversary at Nautika. We arrived at 6:30pm so the scenery was beautiful and we saw sunset. The food was beautiful and every bit of it was delicious - the beef and tortellini were our favourites. There were lots of little touches that were wonderful too. We were served by Mica who was very attentive and shared good details about what we were eating. Such a treat from start to finish.

This is the second time we have visited Nautika and I'm pleased to say it is still as excellent as it was the last time we visited. 

You couldn't wish for a more picturesque setting with beautifully prepared food served with the ideal choice of wine to compliment the food.

This was a special treat for my 60th birthday and the restaurant and staff didn't disappoint in the quality of service and food. 

Were were served by the very knowledgeable 'Mica'. He provided information and knowledge about wash course and where the ingredients are sourced from.

If you are looking for the best food experience then look no further.
Best food I ever had! Amazing view. This restaurant is a must visit when you are in Dubrovnik. It’s just amazing
The food, wine, and service were all excellent. We were very well taken care of and left feeling happy and pampered. This is a great place to try out Croatian wine and fine dining.

Nautika was a highlight of our trip to Dubrovnik. Perched right on the cliff overlooking the city wall, it was a spectacular experience to dine al fresco with the city lit up at night. The food was terrific, and the service was excellent. Highly recommend!

Amazing evening in amazing settings. Thank you for such an amazing night. We were made to feel so special. Thank you for the best evening Mr. Ragusino you looked after us so well. What a stunning restaurant!

Truly the best dinner I’ve had to date. Every detail was perfect. The view while eating on the terrace was breathtaking. Gorgeous sunset and unforgettable menu. Every course was flawless… flavors and presentation were amazing. Wonderful taste of Croatian food!
The food was perfectly prepared and delicious. The staff was even better as they were friendly and extremely helpful. We loved the veal, the lamb, the fish filet and the shrimp starters.

We are a family of 5, with 3 teenagers and we booked Nautika on recommendation and when we arrived we were not disappointed. It is simply a stunning building and the whole ambience is gorgeous. As you would expect at a high end restaurant you are warmly greeted and we were shown to sofa area for pre dinner drinks. an array of fancy cocktails presented in a somewhat theatre style was well received and we waited patiently for our table. One of the recommendations of the restaurant was the amazing view, probably in fact better during the day for lunch (We booked dinner) but nonetheless we were expecting to be on the main terrace which had a great vibe, candlelight and buzzing from the chatter. Instead we were taken upstairs to a balcony area, which did not have the view and was very small, still laid up beautifully but definitely felt like an overflow area. Big disppointment. We voiced as such as were told that the terrace was fully booked (we booked ourselves of course) but apparently others had booked before we had (clearly not able to confirm or deny such a claim) but the option was eat here or not at all.
The meal itself was wonderful, service was excellent (despite being in overflow !) food is fancy and delicious and wine and overall evening was lovely. They took the cocktails from the bill as a sort of apology for our disappointment over the location. Overall it gets a 5* from me as we are rating the food, service and ambience which was all excellent, but just still a bit disappointed that I feel we didnt get the full Nautika experience that others downstairs did.

Stunning, just stunning! The setting, the atmosphere the warm and welcoming staff. Knowledgeable and enthusiastic waiters. The food was the best and freshest, I simply cannot put into words. More than highly recommend!

The food was amazing, the plates are Unic & Fantastic presentations 
And the warm waiters as the top of the place 
We are in the terrace, was the best experience

Nautika is really a unique restaurant. The view is to die for, but also offers privacy from the rest of the crowds. All of the seats outside offer exceptional views of the Fortress and the Adriatic Sea. The food and service match the equally impressive views. The cuisine is focused on local ingredients with a Croatian influence. Everything we ate was at its peak freshness and it’s very obvious the restaurant takes pride in curating the local olive oils, wines and spices to select only the finest. We went with two kids and the restaurant was very accommodating in offering kids entrees like pasta, grilled chicken breast, steak, etc. We enjoyed the beetroot salad, the truffle tortellini and a whole grilled Dentex. The restaurant grilled the whole fish and then table side deboned and filleted the fish. We really didn’t have room for dessert and the restaurant still came by with petit fours so we could leave on a sweet note. I will also note that prior to this restaurant, our experience with Croatian wines was a little hit or miss. The sommelier asked what we normally like and recommended some exceptional wines that we paired with our meal. All in all, couldn’t have been happier with the experience.
Service… Presentation and location are amazing but the food was just okay in my opinion. I wanted to really be WOWED based on all the reviews but unfortunately wasn’t.

Dino Superbly created a magnificent dining experience. It didn’t hurt that we watched the sun set over the fort on a beautiful evening. The food was incredible, as were the wonderful suprises that accompanied the meal.

The restaurant and food was absolutely wonderful! Dundo Maroje was our server and everything exceeded expectations,; he was attentive, warm and such a pleasure to talk to. The food, service and overall experience was amazing and we will forever come back here whenever we visit Dubrovnik!
Absolutely amazing restaurant. Food was great and the service was wonderful. Dundo Maroje went above and beyond and made the experience memorable

Took my wife here for her birthday whilst we holidayed in Dubrovnik. Fantastic restaurant, fantastic food, massive wine list and very good attentive staff. The bill itself was not as pricey as I was expecting. Great outlook from the terrace aswell. Very romantic

Lovely restaurant! Fabulous service! Phenomenal food and wine recommendations by my server, Dundo! The terrace is a gorgeous atmosphere - would be stunning to get here in time for sunset. Truly world class - white glove service, a chilled container even for your water bottle, complimentary house palate cleansers and mini desserts. Numerous local olive oils, paired intentionally with each dish. Highly recommend d the shrimp starter and sea bass main course. A class act all around!

An amazing dinner in Dubrovnik. Not to be missed. Between the old tone walls and the fort of Dubrovnik under the stars we experience a five and seven course gourmet tasting menu, our server Mr. Ragusina Provided exemplary service, he was warm and friendly and engaging, recommending the best foods and wine. Highly recommend, not to be missed.
Outstanding evening embraced with top notch wine pairing and even better service ! Thank you for unforgettable expirience <3
The food, the service, the atmosphere, was absolutely stunning. Thank you to Maro and everyone else who made our visit here so memorable. 10/10 recommend!!

Had an amazing evening. Our table was looking out towards the beautiful views. The staff were very attentive especially Maro, who was very knowledgeable on every dish. The food was delicious and service was fantastic. Highly recommend!
Incredible food. Incredible views. Incredible service. Ask for Maro for a perfect evening. His wine pairing recommendations were on point.
Maro was a truly excellent host. The food was wonderful and perfectly paced — get the seven courses! Would recommend to all our friends.

Our server Maro was so great. Very informative and very nice, funny. The somm was very knowledgeable and great with suggestions. We did the 5 course tasting and it was worth every penny. A must if in Dubrovnik. I’m trying to decide my favourite dish, but they were all great. Tuna tartare maybe.
Maro made the visit - top waiter who looked after us superbly!! The view from the terrace are stunning, the food is superb. Highly recommended.
Our dinner with Maro at Nautika was incredible. He was so knowledgeable as a waiter and a pleasure to talk to. The food and ambiance was amazing. Must visit
Maro was a lovely server and highly knowledgeable. The food was amazing with stunning views and I would highly recommend.
Best meal, best service, amazing wines and a great view. Maro, our waiter, and the sommelier’s choice of Kutlaj made our evening. Our best evening in Croatia
Had a beautiful dinner with the most impeccable service thanks to Maro! So much attention to detail! Definitely recommend

Incredible experience for our honeymoon. The food was wonderful and so interesting and enjoyable to try local produce. Our waiter Maro went above and beyond - we never went without anything and the detail we were provided on each course (we did the 7 course taster) was extremely useful and gave us a true insight into where the produce came from. Would 100% recommend this restaurant.

The restaurant has such a beautiful setting and the food was immaculate. Maro was an excellent server and made sure we received everything we asked for. We highly recommend Nautika for anyone visiting Dubrovnik!
Thank you/hvala Maro for making this night wonderful! Amazing service,view and food to remember! We loved it!
Our flight was delayed but it was our anniversary- the restaurant was very accommodating and able to shift our reservation. They were very hospitable, had a great view & the food was spectacular
The service was excellent. Mica was our waiter, super nice, funny and helpful! The food was exquisite! Very tasteful and well presented.

My boyfriend and I came here on our last night in Dubrovnik. Both of us being big food lovers with an appreciation of a well done meal, we knew we had to go to a Michelin rated spot. This place was exactly that. An incredible meal that was prepared to perfection with outstanding service. Maro and Ivan the tall were our waitstaff and to say we LOVED every aspect of this experience would be an understatement. It’s fine dining with out being pretentious and the people that work here were knowledgeable, funny and kind. This was the best meal we had in the region! Highly recommend!

We had such an incredible dinner with excellent service by Mr. Ragusino. He suggested the most amazing wine that we enjoyed throughout our meal. I got the beef and my husband got the veal and it was extraordinary. Perfect first dinner celebrating our honeymoon. Mr. Ragusino we will definitely be returning to dine with you again. Can’t forget the incredible views!
Food was out of this world. The staff led by Maro were exceptional, every course was divine and location was amazing. The veal was a particular highlight.

My husband and I were finally able to obtain a reservation for dinner at this enchanting restaurant the last night of our Croatian trip before heading back to Atlanta and it certainly was was of the highlights our our visit. We enjoyed the seven course menu selection and our sommelier helped us select the fabulous local red wine that was perfect. My cocktail before dinner was delivered in a birdcage surrounded by rose pedals and our red wine was properly decanted before being served. Our server Maro and many other white gloved servers providing the most attentive service all evening certainly made the evening special. Every course was beautifully presented and so delicious. Our table on the terrace overlooking the walls of Dubrovnik’s old town, the Adriatic Sea and the ruins of a Fortress was perfect and the changing light all evening made everything magical. This dining experience should definitely be on anyone’s agenda while visiting. Thank you for the lovely evening.

Very good restaurant with beautiful view
MARO is very welcoming, professional and very kindness.
We recommanded this restaurant without hésitation.
👍
Amazing dinner . Great location and great selection of Croatian wine. I really suggest this restaurant if you want to spend a romantic dinner.

We had a wonderful dinner at Nautika - we ordered the five course tasting menu and everything was perfect. One of the best views in Old Town for sure. Maro and all the staff were exceptional. Truly an unforgettable meal!
Maro was the best. Amazing recommendations for food and wine pairings. Unbeatable views. We are forever grateful for Maro for starting our trip to Dubrovnik on the right foot!!!
One of the best foodexperiences in Dubrovnik for us. You won’t regret visiting this place. Amazing tuna tartar.
The food amazing! The view beaaaautiful! And the service even better. Mario is the best. The drinks are amazing. They know what they are doing.
What can I say.. breathtaking views, amazing food and recommendations from our server Maro. One of a kind service was provided and we will recommend him and this restaurant to all our friends!!!

Such a beautiful meal in a fabulous location/view, just outside the Old City.
Each course was wonderfully presented by Maro, our exceptional waiter. 

The food and drinks are well priced and taste fantastic. The meat was tender and flavorful.

The swifts flying at sunset provided evening entertainment, accompanied by the live, soft music, topped the experience off nicely. A night we will never forget!

Thank you Maro and restaurant Nautika!
Setting was fantastic; the food was outstanding, but by far the service is unmatched - blows the socks off of anything I have experienced in some of the top spots in London. Highly recommend
Michelin Star worthy dinner. Every dish was fantastic and Maro our waiter was beyond amazing. I will definitely return.

Fantastic food and excellent service! The spectacular views are an added bonus. We both had sea bass and loved it. Our waiter was amazing as was the hostess. It may have been the best restaurant we have been to, and we have traveled a lot.
Best food in Dalmatia! Try be served by Maro! What an experience! Attention to every detail and not stiff! The view is hard to beat!

My husband and I had a wonderful fine dining experience at Nautika in July. It is beyond me as to how this restaurant doesn’t have at least one Michelin star. We have dined at many European and American Michelin-starred restaurants and were very impressed with Nautika. The food, the wine, and the service was top-notch. Not to mention the location and breathtaking views. Highly recommend. We will return!

Absolutely fantastic experience & Food.. The views are amazing . 
Our waiter Ivan Balek was superb. 

We will return 

Thank you Nautika ❤️

Had such an amazing time at Nautika for a lovely sunset dinner. Our sever Maro was so polite and made sure we got the most of our experience here. I highly recommend dining at Nautika and trying the 5 course tasting menu. It will not disappoint.

Stunning views. Outstanding service. Marojf was an absolute gem- kind, well spoken and thorough. Cocktails were presented in an exceptional manner, above and beyond! Ambiance, decor all a 10 out of 10. Highly recommend dining at Nautika :)

the restaurant is absolutely gorgeous and even though it started raining we were quickly moved inside without interruption to our wonderful time! the lobster tail is a must order and the local wine was delicious. Our server Mario could not have been more lovely!

My wife and I came here on our honeymoon after hearing great things and seeing strong reviews. We had the best seat in the house after calling ahead of time to request a table with a view. This place was listed online as the 6th most romantic view in the world, but I’m not sure what could top it. We had Maro as our server which was an absolute pleasure. He and the other members of their team delivered arguably the best service I’ve ever received anywhere. Simply spectacular. We did the tasting menu and ordered the Tomac Diplomat to complement the meal. Definitely not cheap, but felt the value was there given the experience. Highly recommend to anyone, but those celebrating a special occasion should make every effort to get a seaside table here!

I had the lamb. It was so good that I almost cried. I came solo for my birthday, and they made me feel like a Queen. Mr. Valentino & Tomas were amazing! Please do yourself a favor and come to Nautika you won’t regret it.

Maro was fantastic - very tentative and explained everything. 

Amazing setting and a very special dinner with a magical atmosphere.

We spent a very happy few hours at Nautica, in the very capable hands of our waiter Mr Ragusino, who was attentive , knowledgable and precisely what one would expect from a fine dining establishment of this nature. Dubrovnik is full of great restaurants, Nautica is known as the best and that was certainly our experience.
Fantastic view, service and food. Thoroughly recommend. We will be back….. ask for a table on t eterrace and book in advance
Holiday dinner in Nautika Old Town Dubrovnik, Croatia. Dinner was perfect. All esitetä are friendly and professional. Logal red wine Markus was very good, I can recommend.

Everything at this restaurant was great! From the food, to the ambiance, the amazing views and service. We had Maro as our waiter. Very nice and friendly, and helpful with the menus. We even got complimentary dessert drinks! Highly recommended

Maro and his team provided an absolute first class dining experience matched only by the beautiful vista of the walls of dubrovnik during sunset. The service was faultless, professional and friendly. I shall return during my current visit to Croatia. Thank you Nautika Restaurantm

Wonderful enviroment and great service. Romatic 2.0!
The waiter Maro inpressed us with great service!!

This was an amazing experience from start to finish. From the email correspondence, to entering and leaving the staff ensured that I had the beat time. Anita is warm, efficient and proactive when dealing with my reservation and special requests. The food was exceptional and there are no words to explain the view, the show the Swallows put on for you (I hope you experience this, we were all mesmerised!) and the overall ambience is top notch. But for me the stand out thing was Maro, my waiter. So passionate and knowledgeable about food, he made my experience very special. A warm and friendly gentleman who catered for all my needs and more, thank you Maro. Make sure you book!!

Great service, great food and great scenery. Mr. Ragusino, our server, was amazing. He was very detailed oriented and made sure we felt at home with service. The food was a celebration of the country and culture.

From the beautiful view, the wonderful five course tasting menu, and the excellent service, Nautika is one of the best michelin restaurants I’ve ever been to. The shrimp gnocchi dish was the best we’ve ever had. Our waiter Mica was also so friendly and made our experience here one of the best!
Very good experience on a special night for us. Great service, food and wine (a huge wine list). Mica was our excellent waiter.
We had the tasting menu. Absolutely amazing! My wife is vegan and they catered for her without any fuss. Great wines to accompany and really great service.

Wow wow wow! The service was incredible, the food sensational and the view magical. Total value for money. It is not just a meal but an incredible experience. Highly recommended. Maro (in the pic) was just so attentive and made the evening

This seven course diner was one of the best diner experiences I’ve ever had. I would recommend booking a table well in advance to get the front row like we did, the view is simply amazing and the whole experience was very romantic. The service was great and they had the best cocktails I’ve ever tried! 
I would recommend going there for their first diner service (around 6-7) because that way you get to see the colors of sunset during your meal. We will definitely go back next time we visit Dubrovnik.
This should be a Michelin star restaurant! Service, food, ambience, view. Come here if you can! Maro (our waiter) was top notch as were the other staff best foie gras I’ve ever had!

My daughter and I dined at this restaurant in June. Experience was absolutely lovely and what totally made it for us, apart from the lovely food wine, what our fabulous waiter. He was way ahead of the curve, absolutely terrific (see photo... If you end up meeting this guy you can only be doubly happy with this restaurant). 

We loved to Dubrovnik so much and especially this restaurant that we are returning to enjoy it again and this time I am bringing my wife over specially to experience this magical old city and its' wonderful restaurants.

Tihana was our waitress tonight, we couldn’t recommended her service and this restaurant any higher.

The food was excellent and the service was immaculate. Beautiful setting.

This is one of the best restaurants that we’ve ever been to. It was excellent from start to finish. The setting is beautiful as is the decor. The waiter was a great guide for food and wine choices. Thanks Maroje! The food was excellent. I would highly recommend this place. It’s worth the extra money.
Great food, amazing service, worldcup wine list. The scenery is out of this world too, Go there! We decided to leave the rest of Dubrovnik for another visit 😁
Everything was perfect, excellent food experience. We had a waiter called Mr. Ragusino. He made the whole experience so much better. Very talented and a good servicemind.

Lovely dinner with a amazing view. Fantastic customer service. Definitely have to come again. 

Special thank you for Mr. Ragusino! ♥️

We visited for our belated ten year wedding anniversary and have never had such a fantastic, memorable meal. The setting is phenomenal, with swallows swooping over the balcony the tables are set out on whilst the sun goes down over Dubrovnik old town and the sea. Recommend the seven course taster menu with paired wines. A different olive oil arrived with each dish too so we experienced many Croatian wine, oils and food all in one night! Maro made our evening extra special. Thank you 😊

We had a delicious dinner with a beautiful view. If you can book a first row table, do it! Mr. Ragusino took excellent care of us, and the sommelier recommended great local wines to pair with our tasting menu.

Last meal of our holiday and we definitely saved the best until last. Unbelievable view and the food was amazing. The service was impeccable and we would recommend anyone to go. We booked a good few weeks prior to going to ensure a front row terrace table and it was worth the organisation.

It was 8 weeks ago that I last ate in this amazing restaurant. Already I've returned with some friends for what I know will be an amazing meal tomorrow evening. 

I did create a minor complication. Without the help of Antonelo and Diana, this minor issue could have turned into a disaster; let me explain.

My wife is also in Dubrovnik on a separate holiday with her Mother. Not wanting to miss out on the delights of this wonderful town, I also booked my own accommodation with a few friends at the same time. Of course I could have spent the entire weekend with my Mother-in-law (MIL), but I doubt I'd have survived long enough to return to this restaurant. Divorce a possibility...murder not outside of the realms of imagination (her mother is a strong woman)

Subsequently I had to balance the desperate urge to return to your establishment, whilst also avoiding my MIL. Antonelo and Diana instantly realised my plight and helped me in securing a booking tomorrow evening at 6:30pm - many days after my Wife and MIL's earlier dinner.

Thank you again guys. Your service is always excellent, and now I can say discrete. As the ancient Greeks would say "mater mea est in lege mentis"
Amazing restaurant. Our waitress Tihana was bubbly, very knowledgable & friendly. Setting was wonderful & the food really was quite something. A great fine dining experience

We came a long to visit this place. First we took Manhatten, then Berlin and finally Dubrovnik (Nautika). The food, service and location is excellent. Our waitor, Maro, is the best ever. We will be back, for sure. Thank you

Beautiful view! Perfect pairings! Exceptional understanding of local products and olive oil. Maro looked after us and was extremely helpful and descriptive. Overall great experience. Best view in Dubrovnik.

Great service of all services. Maro has served as very good today. Great food and a beautiful full on the sea and the old city. Coming backing every year and would recommend the experience to everyone!

We ordered a five course menu. Very good food and service by Mr. Maro. A must stop in Dubrovnik. We ordered local Malvasia wine, which also taste good with the food.. I can recommend to all food lovers.. The terrace on the top of the restaurant offers a beautiful view on romantic side of Dubrovnik..

Maro and his staff are simply on another level the attention to detail is incredible.
Stunning views and the food is to die for, simply a must visit if in Dubrovnik.

Very good restaurant. I can only recommend it.

You have a great view, very good service and delicious food.

Blown away by the table and the view we had over dinner last night. Fortunate to be on the small rear terrace we had wonderful views over the wall and ‘The Red Keep’ and a Blackwater Bay. 
Service was great with some novel little touches and great food. Absolutely loved it.

Everything was excellent. We got the Sea Bass, tuna tartare and Lamb Dalmatian and they were all great. Our server Maro was very attentive and went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable and attended to. He was the best! The views were very impressive as well. In all it was a very fine dining experience.

Fantastic service, food is awesome. Staff are very knowledgeable, despite not having a Michelin star, much bettering than some of its Mediterranean counterparts. Keep on doing what you are doing, Michelin star on the way!!

Came for my wife’s 30th, at the end of the holiday, after a full week of incredible food and drinks, but this was by far our favourite. Amazing food and top service from Maro and the team

Would definitely come back if we were in Croatia again

Thanks
Incredible food, amazing service from Tihana, I will 100% visit again. The wine and the scallops were particularly good.

Wow where do I start? From start to finish Nautika was incredible.
We were greeted with a warm welcome, seated at a table with the beautiful views that Nautika offers and then the best experience began.
Our main waitress Tihana was so friendly, knowledgable and kind. We came away from the evening feeling like we’d made a friend! :-)
My boyfriend had the 7 course taster menu, photos attached. We’ve had many a fancy meal before but he says it wins the award for the best meal he’s ever eaten.
Due to being 6 months pregnant there are various foods I need to avoid at the moment and Tihana and her team were so accommodating with helping me find options on the menu. I had scallops for starter, sea bass for main and the most amazing chocolate hazelnut dessert. 
We also loved all the olive oil pairings - !
The cocktails (and mocktails for me) were beautiful and were presented so wonderfully (pics also attached).
The whole experience was culinary genius and we feel lucky to have tried it.
